tika-abh06t0:5_0: Vanditvā sirasā buddhaṃ, dhammaṃ sādhugaṇampi ca.
tika-abh06t0:52_0: Yasmiṃ pana padese so, kāmoyaṃ duvidhopi ca;
tika-abh06t0:61_0: Svāyaṃ rūpabhavo rūpaṃ, evaṃ kāmoti saññito;
tika-abh06t0:64_0: Tasmiṃ kāme idaṃ cittaṃ, sadāvacaratīti ca;
tika-abh06t0:82_0: Puna tīṇeva sambhonti, dasa puññakriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:87_0: Purimā muñcanā ceva, parā tissopi cetanā;
tika-abh06t0:88_0: Hoti dānamayaṃ puññaṃ, evaṃ sesesu dīpaye.
tika-abh06t0:89_0: Idāni assa panaṭṭhavidhassāpi kāmāvacarakusalacittassa ayamuppattikkamo veditabbo.
tika-abh06t0:89_2: aññaṃ vā somanassahetuṃ āgamma haṭṭhapahaṭṭho “atthi dinna”nti ādinayappavattaṃ sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā parehi anussāhito dānādīni puññāni karoti,
tika-abh06t0:89_3: tadāssa somanassasahagataṃ ñāṇasampayuttaṃ asaṅkhārikaṃ paṭhamaṃ mahākusalacittaṃ uppajjati.
tika-abh06t0:89_4: Yadā pana vuttanayeneva haṭṭhapahaṭṭho sammādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā parehi ussāhito karoti,
tika-abh06t0:89_6: Imasmiṃ panatthe saṅkhāroti attano vā parassa vā pavattassa pubbappayogassādhivacanaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:89_7: Yadā pana ñātijanassa paṭipattidassanena jātaparicayā bālakā bhikkhū disvā somanassajātā sahasā yaṃ kiñci hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh06t0:89_11: evaṃ ñātijanena ussāhitā hutvā hatthagataṃ dadanti vā vandanti vā,
tika-abh06t0:89_13: Yadā pana deyyadhammappaṭiggāhakādīnaṃ asampattiṃ vā aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvaṃ āgamma catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh06t0:94_0: Sattarasa sahassāni, dve satāni asīti ca;
tika-abh06t0:96_0: Taṃ pana yathānurūpaṃ kāmāvacarasugatiyaṃ bhavabhogasampattiṃ abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh06t0:97_10: vitakkavicārapītisukhavippahīnaṃ upekkhācittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ pañcamanti idaṃ pañcavidhaṃ rūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t0:98_0: Taṃ pana yathāsambhavaṃ pathavīkasiṇādīsu ārammaṇesu pavattivasena anekavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:98_1: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ rūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ yathānurūpaṃ rūpāvacarūpapattinipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:99_0: Sesesu pana dvīsu arūpāvacarakusalacittaṃ tāva upekkhāvedanāyogabhedato ekavidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:99_10: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṃ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṃ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṃ amanasikārā ākāsānañcāyatanasaññāsahagataṃ,
tika-abh06t0:99_14: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ arūpāvacarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ yathānurūpaṃ arūpūpapattinipphādakaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:100_11: Sabbaṃ panetaṃ lokuttarabhāvanāpuññavasappavattaṃ maggānurūpaphalappavattiyā cattāro ariyapuggale abhinipphādeti.
tika-abh06t0:102_0: Kāme aṭṭheva rūpe ca, pañca cattārirūpisu;
tika-abh06t0:109_1: niyatāniyatavatthuvasena ca ekahetukaduhetukavasena ca paṭisandhijanakājanakavasena ca duvidhaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:109_2: tīhi vedanāhi yogato ca lobhamūlaṃ dosamūlaṃ mohamūlanti mūlato ca tividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:109_3: Tattha lobhamūlaṃ pana somanassupekkhādiṭṭhippayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:110_0: Yadā hi “natthi kāmesu ādīnavo”tiādinā nayena micchādiṭṭhiṃ purakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho kāme vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh06t0:110_1: diṭṭhamaṅgalādīni vā sārato pacceti sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh06t0:110_5: Yadā micchādiṭṭhiṃ apurakkhatvā kevalaṃ haṭṭhatuṭṭho methunaṃ dhammaṃ vā paribhuñjati,
tika-abh06t0:110_7: parassa bhaṇḍaṃ vā harati sabhāvatikkheneva anussāhitena cittena,
tika-abh06t0:110_11: Yadā pana kāmānaṃ vā asampattiṃ āgamma aññesaṃ vā somanassahetūnaṃ abhāvena catūsupi vikappesu somanassarahitā honti,
tika-abh06t0:111_3: Assa pana pāṇātipātādīsu tikkhamandappavattikāle uppatti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:112_0: Mohamūlampi vicikicchuddhaccayogato duvidhaṃ hoti upekkhāsahagataṃ vicikicchāsampayuttaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:120_2: Tattha vipākacittaṃ bhūmibhedato catubbidhaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttaranti.
tika-abh06t0:121_0: Tattha sahetukavipākacittaṃ sakakusalaṃ viya somanassupekkhāñāṇappayogabhedato aṭṭhavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:122_0: Yathā panassa kusalaṃ dānādivasena chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati,
tika-abh06t0:122_2: Idaṃ hi paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutitadārammaṇavasena parittadhammapariyāpannesuyeva chasu ārammaṇesu pavattati.
tika-abh06t0:122_3: Sampayuttadhammānañca visese asatipi ādāsatalādīsu mukhanimittaṃ viya nirussāhaṃ vipākaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:137_0: Appavattanato ceva, pākā puññehi no samā.
tika-abh06t0:142_0: Tathā viratiyo tisso, na panetesu jāyare;
tika-abh06t0:143_0: Pañca sikkhāpadā vuttā, kusalāti hi satthunā.
tika-abh06t0:149_0: Ñeyyaṃ paccayato ceva, vipākesu ca viññunā.
tika-abh06t0:157_7: upekkhāsahagataṃ ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātusantīraṇanti idaṃ pana aṭṭhavidhaṃ ahetukavipākacittaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t0:162_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ pana ahetukavipākacittaṃ kiccato aṭṭhavidhaṃ hoti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t0:164_4: Tattha paṭhamā ekantamiṭṭhārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato somanassayuttāva hutvā pañcadvāre santīraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānā pañcasu dvāresu ṭhatvā vipaccati,
tika-abh06t0:164_5: chasu pana dvāresu balavārammaṇe tadārammaṇaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t0:164_6: Dutiyā pana iṭṭhamajjhattārammaṇe pavattisabbhāvato upekkhāsahagatā hutvā santīraṇatadārammaṇapaṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena
tika-abh06t0:164_8: Manussaloke tāva jaccandhajaccabadhirajaccajaḷajaccummattakapaṇḍakaubhatobyañjananapuṃsakādīnaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇakāle paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t0:164_9: Paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya pavattiyaṃ yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā vipaccati.
tika-abh06t0:164_12: maraṇakāle cuti hutvāti imesu pana pañcasu ṭhānesu vipaccatīti.
tika-abh06t0:168_7: upekkhācittekaggatāsampayuttaṃ pañcamanti imāni pañcapi rūpāvacaravipākacittāni upapattiyaṃ paṭisandhibhavaṅgacutivasena pavattanti.
tika-abh06t0:169_1: Tāni sakakusalāni viya ārammaṇabhedato catubbidhāni honti. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t0:187_0: Sesaṃ sabbaṃ ca sesena, kusalena samaṃ mataṃ. –
tika-abh06t0:204_0: Ettha pana upekkhāsahagatāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu ekādasavidhenāpi akusalacittena kamme āyūhite kammakammanimittagatinimittesu
tika-abh06t0:204_1: aññataraṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā catūsu apāyesu paṭisandhi hutvā vipaccati,
tika-abh06t0:204_2: paṭisandhiyā vītivattāya dutiyacittavāraṃ tato paṭṭhāya yāvatāyukaṃ bhavaṅgaṃ hutvā,
tika-abh06t0:208_5: cakkhuviññāṇādibhedato akusalavipākaṃ sattavidhanti chattiṃsavidhaṃ vipākacittaṃ veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:212_4: Tattha sahetukaṃ ekavidhaṃ arahato eva uppajjanato.
tika-abh06t0:212_15: Etāni pana yathānurūpaṃ dānādivasena khīṇāsavānaṃyeva pavattanti.
tika-abh06t0:214_0: Tattha kiriyāhetukamanodhātu upekkhāsahagatā hadayavatthuṃ nissāya cakkhudvāre iṭṭhaiṭṭhamajjhattaaniṭṭhaaniṭṭhamajjhattesu
tika-abh06t0:214_1: rūpārammaṇesu yena kenaci pasāde ghaṭṭite taṃ taṃ ārammaṇaṃ gahetvā āvajjanavasena cakkhuviññāṇassa purecārī
tika-abh06t0:214_4: Itarā pana dve ahetukamanoviññāṇadhātuyo sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇāti duvidhā honti.
tika-abh06t0:214_5: Tattha asādhāraṇā pana kiriyāhetukamanoviññāṇadhātu somanassasahagatā khīṇāsavasseva chasu dvāresu chasu
tika-abh06t0:214_9: sā tīsu bhavesu sabbesaṃ sacittakasattānaṃ sādhāraṇā,
tika-abh06t0:214_10: na kassaci pana sacittakassa na uppajjati nāma.
tika-abh06t0:215_3: akusalato catūhīti imehi aṭṭhahi cittehi puthujjanā hasanti,
tika-abh06t0:221_0: Chahi sekhā asekhā ca, hasanti pana pañcahi.
tika-abh06t0:223_9: tāni pana sekhaputhujjanānaṃ bhāvanāpuññavasappavattānīti ayameva imesaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:228_0: Yāva khīṇāsavo bhikkhu, na samāpajjateva naṃ;
tika-abh06t0:229_0: Tāva tā kusalā eva, samāpannā sace kriyā.
tika-abh06t0:242_2: vīsatividhaṃ kiriyacittanti ādimhi nikkhittaṃ cittaṃ ekūnanavutippabhedena vidhinā pakāsitaṃ hotīti.
tika-abh06t0:248_0: Aṭṭha lokuttare katvā, niddiṭṭhā hi samāsato.
tika-abh06t0:254_0: Ye taranti imaṃ lokaṃ, parañceva taranti teti.
tika-abh06t0:263_1: Tesu kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpena āgatā ekūnatiṃsa dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t0:263_3: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā saddhā sati vīriyaṃ paññā jīvitindriyaṃ alobho
tika-abh06t0:263_4: adoso hirī ottappaṃ kāyappassaddhi cittappassaddhi kāyalahutā cittalahutā kāyamudutā cittamudutā kāyakammaññatā
tika-abh06t0:263_11: Puna karuṇā muditā kāyaduccaritavirati vacīduccaritavirati micchājīvavirati ceti ime pañca aniyatā.
tika-abh06t0:264_0: Imesu pana karuṇāmuditāvasena bhāvanākāle karuṇāpubbabhāgo vā muditāpubbabhāgo vā etā uppajjanti,
tika-abh06t0:264_2: Yadā pana iminā cittena micchākammantādīhi viramati,
tika-abh06t0:264_7: Tasmā etesu ekena saha catuttiṃseva dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t0:269_0: Kasmā panettha mettā ca, upekkhā ca na uddhaṭā;
tika-abh06t0:273_0: Upekkhā gahitā yasmā, tasmā na gahitā ubho.
tika-abh06t0:276_0: Sarūpeneva sabbete, pāḷiyaṃ na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t0:278_0: Yasmā aniyatā keci, yasmā rāsiṃ bhajanti na;
tika-abh06t0:279_0: Yasmā ca dubbalā keci, tasmā vuttā na pāḷiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:289_0: Phusitvā pana phassena, vedanāya ca vedaye;
tika-abh06t0:290_0: Sañjānāti ca saññāya, cetanāya ca cetaye.
tika-abh06t0:293_0: Phassova paṭhamaṃ vutto, tasmā idha mahesinā.
tika-abh06t0:295_0: Akāraṇamidaṃ sabbaṃ, cittānaṃ tu saheva ca;
tika-abh06t0:298_0: Ayaṃ tu paṭhamuppanno, ayaṃ pacchāti natthidaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:302_0: Iccevaṃ pana viññeyyaṃ, viññunā na visesato.
tika-abh06t0:306_0: Yasmā pana ime dhammā vacanatthalakkhaṇādīhi vuccamānā pākaṭā honti suviññeyyāva,
tika-abh06t0:306_9: Ayaṃ hi arūpadhammopi samāno ārammaṇesu phusanākāreneva pavattati,
tika-abh06t0:306_10: so dvinnaṃ meṇḍānaṃ sannipāto viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t0:309_1: Saddhiṃ attanā sampayuttadhamme ārammaṇe abhisandahatīti attho.
tika-abh06t0:312_0: Pinayatīti pīti. Sā sampiyāyanalakkhaṇā, kāyacittapīṇanarasā, pharaṇarasā vā, odagyapaccupaṭṭhānā.
tika-abh06t0:318_1: Taṃ pana attanā avinibbhuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:318_5: Santepi ca tesaṃ anupālanalakkhaṇādimhi vidhāne atthikkhaṇeyeva taṃ te dhamme anupāleti udakaṃ viya uppalādīni,
tika-abh06t0:318_6: yathāsakaṃ paccayuppannepi ca dhamme anupāleti dhāti viya kumāraṃ,
tika-abh06t0:318_8: na bhaṅgato uddhaṃ pavattayati attano ca pavattayitabbānañca abhāvā,
tika-abh06t0:318_9: na bhaṅgakkhaṇe ṭhapeti sayaṃ bhijjamānattā khīyamāno viya vattisnehova padīpasikhanti.
tika-abh06t0:319_3: So ārammaṇe cittassa alaggabhāvalakkhaṇo kamaladale jalabindu viya,
tika-abh06t0:331_0: Kiriyā kāro, manasmiṃ kāro manasikāro. Purimamanato visadisaṃ manaṃ karotīti ca manasikāro.
tika-abh06t0:332_8: saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpanno ārammaṇapaṭipādakattena sampayuttānaṃ sārathī viya daṭṭhabbo.
tika-abh06t0:333_0: Karuṇāti paradukkhe sati sādhūnaṃ hadayakampanaṃ karotīti karuṇā,
tika-abh06t0:335_2: Lakkhaṇādito pana etā tissopi viratiyo kāyaduccaritādivatthūnaṃ avītikkamalakkhaṇā,
tika-abh06t0:335_6: Keci pana imāsu ekekaṃ niyataṃ viratiṃ icchanti.
tika-abh06t0:335_7: Evaṃ kāmāvacarapaṭhamamahākusalacittena ime tettiṃsa vā catuttiṃsa vā dhammā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:336_3: Puna tatiyena ñāṇavippayogato ṭhapetvā amohaṃ avasesā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:336_5: paṭhame vuttesu pana ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā pañcamena sampayogaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh06t0:336_12: Sattamena pana ṭhapetvā paññaṃ avasesā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā dhammā honti,
tika-abh06t0:340_1: tattha paṭhamacittasampayuttā tāva kāmāvacarapaṭhamacitte vuttesu ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:340_4: Dutiyena vitakkavajjā dvattiṃsa vā tettiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t0:340_5: Tatiyena vicāravajjā ekatiṃsa vā dvattiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t0:340_6: Catutthena tato pītivajjā tiṃsa vā ekatiṃsa vā.
tika-abh06t0:342_1: te pana paṭhamajjhānike maggacitte paṭhamarūpāvacaracitte vuttanayena dutiyajjhānikādibhedepi maggacitte
tika-abh06t0:342_3: Karuṇāmuditānamabhāvo ca niyataviratibhāvo ca lokuttarabhāvo cettha viseso.
tika-abh06t0:343_0: Akusalā pana cetasikā bhūmito ekavidhā kāmāvacarāyeva,
tika-abh06t0:343_1: tesu lobhamūlapaṭhamākusalacittasampayuttā tāva niyatā sarūpenāgatā pannarasa,
tika-abh06t0:343_3: Aniyatā cha yevāpanakāti sabbe pañcavīsati honti.
tika-abh06t0:343_5: phasso somanassavedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittassekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ
tika-abh06t0:343_6: lobho moho micchādiṭṭhīti ime sarūpenāgatā pannarasa,
tika-abh06t0:343_7: chando adhimokkho uddhaccaṃ manasikāroti ime cattāro niyatayevāpanakā,
tika-abh06t0:343_8: ime pana paṭipāṭiyā dasasu cittesu niyatā honti,
tika-abh06t0:343_9: māno issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhanti ime chayeva aniyatayevāpanakā.
tika-abh06t0:357_1: Iti ime ekūnavīsati cetasikā paṭhamākusalacittena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:357_4: Sasaṅkhārabhāvo cettha thinamiddhassa niyatabhāvo ca viseso.
tika-abh06t0:357_5: Tatiyena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ sesā aṭṭhārasa veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:357_8: Catutthena dutiye vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:357_10: Pañcamena paṭhame vuttesu ṭhapetvā pītiṃ avasesā sampayogaṃ gacchantīti.
tika-abh06t0:357_15: Sattamena pañcame vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:357_17: Aṭṭhamena chaṭṭhe vuttesu ṭhapetvā diṭṭhiṃ avasesā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:358_0: Domanassasahagatesu paṭighasampayuttesu dosamūlesu dvīsu paṭhamena asaṅkhārikena sampayuttā niyatā sarūpenāgatā terasa.
tika-abh06t0:358_2: phasso domanassavedanā saññā cetanā cittekaggatā vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ doso
tika-abh06t0:358_3: moho ceti ime terasa dhammā chandādīhi catūhi niyatayevāpanakehi sattarasa honti issāmacchariyakukkuccesu
tika-abh06t0:358_4: aniyatesu tīsu ekena saha aṭṭhārasa honti,
tika-abh06t0:360_9: Iti ime sattarasa vā aṭṭhārasa vā navamena sampayogaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:361_0: Dvīsu pana mohamūlesu vicikicchāsampayuttena ekādasamena sampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā saññā cetanā
tika-abh06t0:361_1: vitakko vicāro vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhiti ahirikaṃ anottappaṃ moho vicikicchāti sarūpenāgatā terasa,
tika-abh06t0:362_2: Sabhāvaṃ vicinanto etāya kicchati kilamatīti vicikicchā.
tika-abh06t0:363_0: Dvādasamena uddhaccasampayuttena sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā vicikicchāsahagate vuttesu vicikicchāhīnā uddhaccaṃ sarūpena āgataṃ,
tika-abh06t0:364_2: Tattha vipākā kusalā viya bhūmivasena catubbidhā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ lokuttarañceti.
tika-abh06t0:364_8: Kāmāvacaravipākānaṃ ekantaparittārammaṇattā viratiyo panettha ekantakusalattā na labbhanti.
tika-abh06t0:367_0: Bāttiṃsa pañcame chaṭṭhe, ekatiṃsa tato pare.
tika-abh06t0:368_1: Tesu cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā tāva phasso upekkhāvedanā saññā cetanā jīvitaṃ cittaṭṭhitīti sarūpenāgatā cha,
tika-abh06t0:368_4: Tattha kāyaviññāṇasampayuttesu pana upekkhāṭhāne sukhavedanā paviṭṭhā.
tika-abh06t0:371_0: Sati kasmā upekkhāva, vuttā catūsu satthunā.
tika-abh06t0:378_1: Manodhātunā sampayuttā sarūpenāgatā cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ vuttā cha,
tika-abh06t0:378_3: adhimokkhamanasikārehi dvīhi yevāpanakehi dasa dhammā honti.
tika-abh06t0:379_2: Te sabbepi attano attano kusalacittasampayuttacetasikehi sadisāyevāti.
tika-abh06t0:380_1: Te sabbe tesaṃyeva lokuttaravipākacittānaṃ sadisā kusalacittasampayuttehi cetasikehi sadisā.
tika-abh06t0:382_0: Kiriyābyākatā ca cetasikā bhūmito tividhā honti kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarā arūpāvacarāti.
tika-abh06t0:382_3: te pana aṭṭhahi kāmāvacarakusalacittasampayuttehi samānā ṭhapetvā viratittayaṃ aniyatayevāpanakesu karuṇāmuditāyeva uppajjanti.
tika-abh06t0:382_8: Hasituppādacittena sampayuttā dvādasa dhammā honti pītiyā saha.
tika-abh06t0:383_3: Evaṃ vīsati kiriyacittasampayuttā ca cetasikā veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:384_0: Ettāvatā kusalākusalavipākakiriyabhedabhinnena ekūnanavutiyā cittena sampayuttā cetasikā niddiṭṭhā honti.
tika-abh06t0:402_1: phasso vedanā saññā cetanā vitakko vicāro pīti cittekaggatā vīriyaṃ jīvitaṃ chando adhimokkho manasikāro
tika-abh06t0:402_2: tatramajjhattatā saddhā sati hirī ottappaṃ alobho adoso amoho kāyappassaddhiādīni cha yugāni,
tika-abh06t0:402_4: karuṇā muditā lobho doso moho uddhaccaṃ māno diṭṭhi issā macchariyaṃ kukkuccaṃ thinaṃ middhaṃ vicikicchā ahirikaṃ anottappañcāti.
tika-abh06t0:410_0: Phassādīnaṃ tu dhammānaṃ, pavakkhāmi ito paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:416_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitindriyaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:423_0: Upekkhā pañcapaññāsa-citte dukkhaṃ tu tīsu hi.
tika-abh06t0:452_0: Tathā viratiyo tisso, sabbe te pañcavīsati;
tika-abh06t0:458_0: Lobho doso ca moho ca, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t0:464_0: Lobho aṭṭhasu niddiṭṭho, vuttā catūsu diṭṭhitu;
tika-abh06t0:470_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā jīvitaṃ mano;
tika-abh06t0:471_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti vīriyasamādhi ca.
tika-abh06t0:473_0: Chando cevādhimokkho ca, manasikāro ca cuddasa;
tika-abh06t0:503_0: Maggo aṭṭhasu cittesu, mato aṭṭhaṅgikoti hi;
tika-abh06t0:506_0: Balāni dve dvicittesu, ekasmiṃ tīṇi dīpaye;
tika-abh06t0:510_0: Cittamevaṃ tu viññeyyaṃ, sabalaṃ abalampi ca.
tika-abh06t0:527_0: Puññāpuññavipākā hi, kāme dasa ca pañca ca;
tika-abh06t0:534_0: Sabbaṃ vuttapakāraṃ tu, tividhaṃ hoti mānasaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:536_0: Sabbo kāmavipāko ca, rūpe pañcadasāpi ca;
tika-abh06t0:548_0: Viññāṇāni ca dvepañca, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca;
tika-abh06t0:570_0: Evañcāpi hi taṃ cittaṃ, hoti sabbaṃ catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:573_0: Tathā dasa kriyā kāme, abhiññāmānasaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:576_0: Janayanti ca viññattiṃ, ime dvattiṃsa mānasā.
tika-abh06t0:578_0: Kusalā ca kriyā ceva, te mahaggatamānasā;
tika-abh06t0:582_0: Copanaṃ na ca pāpenti, dvikiccā niyatā ime.
tika-abh06t0:584_0: Ṭhapetvā dasa viññāṇe, vipākā dvīsu bhūmisu;
tika-abh06t0:591_0: Na karonti tikiccāni, ime soḷasa mānasā.
tika-abh06t0:615_0: Idaṃ dviṭṭhānikaṃ nāma, hoti cittadvayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:633_0: Tikiccaṃ navakaṃ dve tu, dvikiccā sesamekakaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:638_0: Chabbidhaṃ hoti taṃ channaṃ, viññāṇānaṃ pabhedato;
tika-abh06t0:645_0: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddādigocarā.
tika-abh06t0:665_0: Dhātudvayaṃ tidhā katvā, pacchimaṃ puna paṇḍito;
tika-abh06t0:681_0: Bahudhā panidaṃ cittaṃ, hotīti ca vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t0:696_0: Gatiyo pañca niddiṭṭhā, satthunā tu tayo bhavā.
tika-abh06t0:698_0: Bhūmiyo tattha tiṃseva, tāsu tiṃseva puggalā;
tika-abh06t0:699_0: Bhūmīsvetāsu uppannā, sabbe ca pana puggalā.
tika-abh06t0:708_0: Idha cittādhikārattā, acittā na ca uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t0:716_0: Tiṃsabhūmīsu cittāni, kati jāyanti me vada;
tika-abh06t0:717_0: Cuddaseva tu cittāni, honti sabbāsu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t0:719_0: Sadā vīsati cittāni, kāmeyeva bhave siyuṃ;
tika-abh06t0:729_0: Cittāni pana jāyanti, cha ca chabbīsabhūmisu.
tika-abh06t0:743_0: Arūpe ca apāye ca, ṭhapetvā aṭṭha bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t0:746_0: Suddhāvāse apāye ca, ṭhapetvā nava bhūmiyo;
tika-abh06t0:753_0: Ṭhapetvā pana sabbāpi, bhūmiyo hi mahaggatā.
tika-abh06t0:756_0: Aṭṭha cittāni jāyante, sadā sattasu bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t0:759_0: Cattāri pana cittāni, tīsu tīsveva bhūmisu.
tika-abh06t0:773_0: Neva jāyanti jāyanti, asīti hadayā sadā.
tika-abh06t0:779_0: Imehi saha cittehi, tayo maggā phaladvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:782_0: Cattāro heṭṭhimā pākā, suddhāvāse na labbhare.
tika-abh06t0:787_0: Domanassādimaggo ca, kriyā ca dve ahetukā;
tika-abh06t0:804_0: Sabbe mahaggatā ceva, sabbepi ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t0:805_0: Tihetukā vipākā ca, kāme nava kriyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:807_0: Duhetuno na jāyanti, cattālīsaṃ tathāṭṭha ca;
tika-abh06t0:826_0: Dutiyaṃ ca phalaṃ hitvā, yāni cittāni tāniti;
tika-abh06t0:829_0: Kati cittāni jāyante, kāme arahato pana;
tika-abh06t0:833_0: Maggacittaṃ siyā tesaṃ, ekacittakkhaṇā hi te.
tika-abh06t0:842_0: Aṭṭhārasa kriyā ceva, aṭṭha lokuttarāni ca.
tika-abh06t0:845_0: Etāni catupaññāsa, cittāni na ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t0:884_0: Tathā vehapphale cāpi, sabbesaṃ honti mānasā.
tika-abh06t0:904_0: Honti tevīsa cittāni, iti vatvā vibhāvaye;
tika-abh06t0:952_0: Ādimaggo tayo pākā, āruppā ca tathūpari;
tika-abh06t0:961_0: Attano attano pākā, cattāro ca anāsavā;
tika-abh06t0:965_0: Catassopi ca āruppā, teraseva kriyā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1003_0: Tiṇṇaṃ puthujjanānaṃ tu, pañceva pana jāyare;
tika-abh06t0:1007_0: Ekameva bhave tesaṃ, iti vatvā vibhāvaye.
tika-abh06t0:1009_0: Mayā bhavesu cittānaṃ, puggalānaṃ vasena ca;
tika-abh06t0:1023_0: Sadā sādhu cinteti vāceti yo taṃ,
tika-abh06t0:1031_0: Dassayissāmahaṃ tena, vinā natthi hi sambhavo.
tika-abh06t0:1033_0: Rūpaṃ saddaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ, phoṭṭhabbaṃ dhammameva ca;
tika-abh06t0:1063_0: Te dhammārammaṇā honti, yesaṃ rūpādayo kira.
tika-abh06t0:1066_0: Neva paccanubhontānaṃ, mano tesaṃ tu gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1074_0: Yaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ hontaṃ, taṃ dhammārammaṇaṃ kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1075_0: Evaṃ sati panetesaṃ, niyamoti kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:1089_0: Nārūpaṃ na ca paññattiṃ, nātītaṃ na canāgataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1090_0: Ārammaṇaṃ karonte ca, vattamāno hi gocaro.
tika-abh06t0:1119_0: Yāni vuttāvasesāni, cittāni pana tāni hi;
tika-abh06t0:1141_0: Kāmato ca kriyā pañca, rūpato pañcamī kriyā;
tika-abh06t0:1145_0: Sakkonti gocaraṃ kātuṃ, kati cittāni me vada.
tika-abh06t0:1155_0: Cittesu pana sabbesu, kati cittāni me vada;
tika-abh06t0:1158_0: Sabbesu pana cittesu, cha ca cittāni me suṇa;
tika-abh06t0:1162_0: Kriyābhiññā manodhātu, cha ca sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1165_0: Nārahattaṃ phalaṃ maggaṃ, kātuṃ sakkonti gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1168_0: Puthujjanā vā sekkhā vā, na sakkonti hi jānituṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1190_0: Etesaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, channaṃ ārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t0:1193_0: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, honti ārammaṇāni hi.
tika-abh06t0:1204_0: Catunnaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ sadā;
tika-abh06t0:1231_0: Yaṃ kriyāmānasaṃ rūpe, kāmapākaṃ tato vinā;
tika-abh06t0:1232_0: Pañcannaṃ pana rāsīnaṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:1255_0: Rūpārammaṇikā dve tu, dve dve saddhādigocarā;
tika-abh06t0:1271_0: Na puññassa na pākassa, hoti ārammaṇaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:1277_0: Kusalaṃ kusalassāpi, vipākassa ca taṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t0:1280_0: Ārammaṇaṃ tidhā hoti, iti vuttaṃ mahesinā.
tika-abh06t0:1282_0: Kriyassāpi kriyā hoti, kusalampi kriyassa ca;
tika-abh06t0:1283_0: Kusalaṃ tu vipākassa, evaṃ hoti tidhā pana.
tika-abh06t0:1286_0: Evameva dvidhā ceva, tidhā cārammaṇaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t0:1308_0: Tīsu dvāresu kammāni, vipākā chasu dissare.
tika-abh06t0:1311_0: Taṃ taṃ paccayamāgamma, dadāti vividhaṃ phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1319_0: Duhetukaṃ tu yaṃ kammaṃ, taṃ na deti tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1359_0: Yadā hi dutiyaṃ cittaṃ, kusalaṃ javanaṃ tadā;
tika-abh06t0:1365_0: Yadā hi tatiyaṃ puññaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t0:1369_0: Iminā pana saddhiṃ cha, purimāni ca pañcapi.
tika-abh06t0:1371_0: Yadā catutthaṃ kusalaṃ, javanaṃ hoti tena ca;
tika-abh06t0:1372_0: Tulyaṃ catutthaṃ pākaṃ tu, tadārammaṇataṃ vaje.
tika-abh06t0:1375_0: Purimāni cha pākāni, iminā honti satta tu.
tika-abh06t0:1404_0: Kamme āyūhite tesaṃ, vipākehi ca tīhipi;
tika-abh06t0:1405_0: Eseva ca nayo tehi, dinnāya paṭisandhiyā.
tika-abh06t0:1410_0: Dassetabbā tappacchā tu, iṭṭhasmiṃ gocare idha;
tika-abh06t0:1411_0: Ekekasmiṃ pana dvāre, dvādasa dvādaseva tu.
tika-abh06t0:1417_0: Bhavatīti ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t0:1419_0: Sandhimekaṃ tu kammekaṃ, janeti na tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1422_0: Ekasmā hi yathā bījā, jāyate ekamaṅkuraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1426_0: Hotīti hi ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t0:1431_0: Tena tulyena pākena, gahitā paṭisandhi ce;
tika-abh06t0:1453_0: Imāni ca bhavaṅgāni, cakkhudvāre panaṭṭha hi.
tika-abh06t0:1468_0: Hotītipi ayaṃ vāro, vutto ettāvatā mayā.
tika-abh06t0:1471_0: Hotīti ca ayaṃ vāro, anupubbena āgato.
tika-abh06t0:1479_0: Paṭisandhi na vattabbā, sā kammasadisāti hi;
tika-abh06t0:1501_0: Purimāni ca tīṇīti, cattārova bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t0:1503_0: Evaṃ cattāri cittāni, dvāresupi ca pañcasu;
tika-abh06t0:1512_0: Jātā sugatiyaṃ yena, pākena paṭisandhi tu;
tika-abh06t0:1513_0: Tena tulyampi hīnaṃ vā, tadārammaṇakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:1518_0: Thero nerayikānaṃ tu, dhammaṃ deseti vassati;
tika-abh06t0:1519_0: Gandhaṃ vāyuñca māpeti, yadā tesaṃ tadā pana.
tika-abh06t0:1521_0: Theraṃ disvā ca sutvā ca, dhammaṃ gandhañca ghāyataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1522_0: Pivatañca jalaṃ vāyuṃ, phusataṃ mudumeva ca.
tika-abh06t0:1531_0: Kusalaṃ pana sandhāya, taṃ vuttanti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1567_0: Na hoti kiṃ nu kātabbaṃ, vada tvaṃ ābhidhammika.
tika-abh06t0:1572_0: Āvajjanaṃ kimassāti, natthi taṃ jāyate kathaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1576_0: Phalacittassa vā evaṃ, natthi āvajjanaṃ kira.
tika-abh06t0:1581_0: Vinā ārammaṇeneva, na hi jāyati mānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1585_0: Cittassa ca niyāmoti, ñeyyā pañca niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t0:1594_0: Vipākaṃ tu yato deti, ayaṃ kammaniyāmatā.
tika-abh06t0:1611_0: Idāni pana sabbesaṃ, etesaṃ mānasaṃ mayā;
tika-abh06t0:1621_0: Gantvā suttānusārena, yūsaṃ pivati tassa sā.
tika-abh06t0:1627_0: Cittaṃ pana ca daṭṭhabbaṃ, majjhe makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t0:1644_0: Idaṃ tu pana opammaṃ, atthaṃ dīpeti kiṃ tu hi;
tika-abh06t0:1648_0: Tato hi paṭhamaṃyeva, jāyatīti hi dīpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1656_0: Khago yathā hi rukkhagge, nilīyantova sākhino;
tika-abh06t0:1657_0: Sākhaṃ ghaṭṭeti tassīdha, chāyā pharati bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1662_0: Evameva ca rūpassa, pasādassa ca ghaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1720_0: Bhavaṃ tu pañcavokāraṃ, sandhāya kathito pana.
tika-abh06t0:1723_0: Kāme dasa ca rūpesu, pañca cattārirūpisu.
tika-abh06t0:1731_0: Aṭṭheva ca mahāpākā, tīṇi santīraṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t0:1738_0: Kāme rūpe bhave ceva, hoti santīraṇattayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1744_0: Kasmā na hoti ce tattha, bījassābhāvato pana.
tika-abh06t0:1747_0: Rūpādigocare tassa, bhaveyya janakaṃ tu yaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1762_0: Hutvā vattanti te cāpi, idaṃ nevānubandhati.
tika-abh06t0:1767_0: Kiṃ tena yuttivādena, vuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu hi;
tika-abh06t0:1779_0: Tathā mahaggate dhamme, ārabbha javane pana;
tika-abh06t0:1786_0: Kathaṃ bhavaṅgato hoti, vuṭṭhānaṃ pana cetaso.
tika-abh06t0:1789_0: Ghaṭṭanāya vinā tasmā, cittānaṃ hoti sambhavo.
tika-abh06t0:1797_0: Kriyacittesu sabbesu, javanaṃ na ca hoti yaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1804_0: Yo dhammo yassa dhammassa, ṭhitiyuppattiyāpi vā.
tika-abh06t0:1806_0: Upakāro hi so tassa, paccayoti pavuccati;
tika-abh06t0:1810_0: Hetūti pana so dhammo, viññātabbo vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t0:1823_0: Na hi te pana rūpānaṃ, sādhenti kusalādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1824_0: Na tesaṃ pana rūpānaṃ, paccayā na ca honti te.
tika-abh06t0:1856_0: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsā cāti satthunā;
tika-abh06t0:1859_0: Chandaṃ tu jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā, chandaṃ katvā dhuraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:1862_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca tīsupi;
tika-abh06t0:1880_0: Tayo bhavā catasso ca, yoniyo gatipañcakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1887_0: Dvedhā hi paccayā tesaṃ, bhavanti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1895_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ tu parittānaṃ, kāme duggatiyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:1896_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1907_0: Channaṃ pana pavatteva, honti no paṭisandhiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1910_0: Kāme sugatiyaṃ tesaṃ, sattannampi tatheva ca;
tika-abh06t0:1911_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1914_0: Pavatte paccayā honti, na honti paṭisandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1923_0: Yathā ca paccayā honti, tathā ñeyyā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t0:1925_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, yoniādīsu tatridaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:1929_0: Datvāna paṭisandhiṃ tu, sabbapākaṃ janeti so.
tika-abh06t0:1949_0: Ekissā yoniyā ceva, ekissā gatiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:1952_0: Catunnaṃ pākacittānaṃ, dvedhā so hoti paccayo.
tika-abh06t0:1961_0: Tato hetuṃ vinā tassa, pātubhāvo na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:1967_0: Na ca satto na ca jīvo, na attā vāpi vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:1978_0: Vatthusannissitaṃ cittaṃ, hoti tasmiṃ khaṇepi ca;
tika-abh06t0:1985_0: Taṇhā nameti saṅkhārā, khipanti sahajā pana.
tika-abh06t0:1987_0: Na mīyamānaṃ taṇhāya, taṃ santativasā pana;
tika-abh06t0:1994_0: Purimaṃ cavanaṃ ettha, pacchimaṃ paṭisandhi tu.
tika-abh06t0:1997_0: Kammādiñca vinā hetuṃ, pātubhūtaṃ na ceva taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:1999_0: Ettha cetassa cittassa, purimā bhavato pana;
tika-abh06t0:2011_0: Athāpi pana ekanta-nānatā sā bhaveyya ce;
tika-abh06t0:2012_0: Khīrasāmī naro neva, dadhisāmī bhaveyya so.
tika-abh06t0:2021_0: Paratthāgamato ceva, idha tassa katassa hi.
tika-abh06t0:2023_0: Aññassa aññato ceva, kammato taṃ phalaṃ siyā;
tika-abh06t0:2024_0: Tasmā na sundaraṃ etaṃ, vidhānaṃ sabbameva ca.
tika-abh06t0:2027_0: Santāne yaṃ phalaṃ etaṃ, nāññassa na ca aññato;
tika-abh06t0:2030_0: Ekasmiṃ pana santāne, vattamānaṃ phalaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:2031_0: Aññassātipi vā neva, aññato vā na hoti taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2037_0: Madhuro phalaso tassa, hoti kālantare pana.
tika-abh06t0:2039_0: Na hi tāni hi bījāni, abhisaṅkharaṇampi vā;
tika-abh06t0:2045_0: Evaṃ santepi taṃ kammaṃ, vijjamānampi vā pana;
tika-abh06t0:2051_0: Atha vāvijjamānaṃ taṃ, niruddhaṃ paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t0:2055_0: Kaṭattā paccayo kammaṃ, tasmā niccaphalaṃ na ca;
tika-abh06t0:2058_0: Kaṭattāyeva taṃ kammaṃ, phalassa pana paccayo;
tika-abh06t0:2071_0: Yaṃ ruppatīti rūpanti, tathā rūpayatīti vā;
tika-abh06t0:2085_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca rūpatā;
tika-abh06t0:2097_0: Pathavī patthaṭattā ca, vāyo vāyanato bhave;
tika-abh06t0:2098_0: Tejo tejeti rūpāni, āpo āpeti pālanā.
tika-abh06t0:2101_0: Lakkhaṇādīsu ñātesu, dhammā āvi bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t0:2103_0: Sāmaññaṃ vā sabhāvo vā, dhammānaṃ lakkhaṇaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2104_0: Kiccaṃ vā tassa sampatti, rasoti paridīpito.
tika-abh06t0:2112_0: Tattha paññāmayaṃ cakkhu, hoti pañcavidhaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:2132_0: Bahiddhā akkhilomehi, paricchinno ca yo pana;
tika-abh06t0:2135_0: Sakalopi ca lokoyaṃ, kamalassa dalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t0:2136_0: Puthulaṃ vipulaṃ nīlaṃ, iti jānāti locanaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2138_0: Cakkhu nāma na taṃ hoti, vatthu tassāti vuccati;
tika-abh06t0:2156_0: Cakkhu kāyappasādo ca, bhāvo jīvitameva ca;
tika-abh06t0:2157_0: Cattālīsañca rūpāni, cattāri tu bhavanti hi.
tika-abh06t0:2162_0: Yo panettha sito atthi, paribandho parittako;
tika-abh06t0:2166_0: Tadetaṃ tassa majjhe tu, sasambhārassa cakkhuno.
tika-abh06t0:2184_0: Sotādīsu ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t0:2186_1: taṃ tanutambalomācite aṅgulivedhakasaṇṭhāne padese vuttappakārāhi dhātūhi katūpakāraṃ utucittāhārehi
tika-abh06t0:2186_2: upatthambhiyamānaṃ āyunā paripāliyamānaṃ sotaviññāṇādīnaṃ vatthudvārabhāvaṃ sādhayamānaṃ tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t0:2187_1: taṃ sasambhāraghānabilassa anto ajapadasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t0:2188_2: sā sasambhārajivhāmajjhassa upari uppaladalaggasaṇṭhāne padese yathāvuttappakārā hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t0:2189_1: Yāvatā pana imasmiṃ kāye upādinnakaṃ rūpaṃ atthi,
tika-abh06t0:2189_2: sabbattha kāyapasādo kappāsapaṭale sneho viya yathāvuttappakāro hutvā tiṭṭhati.
tika-abh06t0:2200_0: Te panevaṃ tu vattabbā, “suttaṃ āharathā”ti hi;
tika-abh06t0:2201_0: Suttameva ca te addhā, na dakkhissanti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t0:2203_0: Visese sati bhūtānaṃ, pasādo hi kathaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t0:2210_0: Na hi bhūtavisesena, hoti tesaṃ visesatā.
tika-abh06t0:2221_0: Yañcetaṃ itthiliṅgādi, na tu taṃ indriyaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t0:2226_0: Na ca taṃ cakkhuviññeyyaṃ, manoviññeyyameva taṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2227_0: Itthiliṅgādayo cakkhuviññeyyā honti vā na vā.
tika-abh06t0:2229_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sesepi purisindriye;
tika-abh06t0:2242_0: Evaṃ sante abhāvo ca, dutiyabyañjanassa tu.
tika-abh06t0:2244_0: Na cābhāvo siyā kasmā, na taṃ byañjanakāraṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2245_0: Tassa kammasahāyaṃ hi, rāgacittaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2258_0: Āhāratāti kabaḷīkāro āhāro. Ojaṭṭhamakaṃ rūpaṃ āharatīti āhāro.
tika-abh06t0:2260_0: Yāya ojāya yāpenti, yattha yattha ca pāṇino;
tika-abh06t0:2264_0: Kevalaṃ na ca sakkoti, pāletuṃ jīvitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:2266_0: Ojā sakkoti pāletuṃ, harituṃ na ca pācakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2267_0: Haritumpi ca pāletuṃ, ubho sakkonti ekato.
tika-abh06t0:2269_0: Kāyaviññattiniddese kāyena attano bhāvaṃ viññāpentānaṃ kāyaggahaṇānusārena gahitāya etāya bhāvo viññāyatīti viññatti.
tika-abh06t0:2269_3: sādhu vācāya saṃvaro”ti āgato copanasaṅkhāto kāyova viññatti kāyaviññatti.
tika-abh06t0:2269_4: Kāyavipphandanena adhippāyaviññāpanahetuttā sayañca tathā viññeyyattā kāyena viññattītipi kāyaviññatti.
tika-abh06t0:2293_0: Saddo na cittajo atthi, vinā viññattighaṭṭanaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2296_0: Sā viññāpanato ceva, ayaṃ viññeyyatopi ca;
tika-abh06t0:2299_0: Na viññattidvayaṃ aṭṭha, rūpāni viya cittajaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2303_0: Na kassatīti ākāso, rūpānaṃ vivaro pana;
tika-abh06t0:2311_0: Etāsaṃ pana tissannaṃ, kamato ca pavattiyaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2314_0: Kammaṃ kātuṃ na sakkoti, lahutādittayaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:2318_4: Etā pana tissopi na aññamaññaṃ vijahanti.
tika-abh06t0:2321_0: Rūpānamācayo yo hi, vutto upacayoti so;
tika-abh06t0:2344_0: Tattha samodhānanti sabbameva idaṃ rūpaṃ sabbasamodhānato pathavīdhātu āpodhātu tejodhātu vāyodhātu cakkhāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh06t0:2344_3: Keci pana middhavādino “middharūpaṃ nāma atthī”ti vadanti,
tika-abh06t0:2344_5: natthi nīvaraṇā tavā”ti ca “thinamiddhanīvaraṇaṃ avijjānīvaraṇañca nīvaraṇasampayutta”nti sampayuttavacanato
tika-abh06t0:2344_6: ca mahāpakaraṇapaṭṭhāne “nīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati napurejātapaccayā”ti arūpepi
tika-abh06t0:2348_4: Tepi tesaṃ visuṃ visuṃ abhāvaṃ dassetvā paṭikkhipitabbā.
tika-abh06t0:2352_0: Kammaṃ utu ca cittañca, āhāro rūpahetuyo;
tika-abh06t0:2353_0: Eteheva ca rūpāni, jāyanti na panaññato.
tika-abh06t0:2361_0: Cittena utunā ceva, saddo dvīhi samuṭṭhito;
tika-abh06t0:2374_0: Kammena vīsati rūpā, sattarasa tu cetasā;
tika-abh06t0:2383_0: Evaṃ sante tu tesampi, pākabhedā siyuṃ na hi;
tika-abh06t0:2384_0: Pāko paccati bhedo vā, na ca bhijjati natthi taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2392_0: Na ceva jāyate jāti, iti ñeyyā vibhāvinā;
tika-abh06t0:2395_0: Tattha yathā siyā jāti, yesaṃ dhammānameva sā;
tika-abh06t0:2398_0: Labhateva tathā tesaṃ, pākabhedā labbhanti te;
tika-abh06t0:2402_0: Na pākabhedā vohāraṃ, taṃ labhanti kadācipi.
tika-abh06t0:2408_0: Tasmā labhati jāti ca, labhatī netaradvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2410_0: Jiyyatīti na vattabbaṃ, taṃ dvayaṃ bhijjatīti vā;
tika-abh06t0:2414_0: Vuttattā jāyaticcetaṃ, atha maññasi ce tuvaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2416_0: Evampi ca na vattabbaṃ, sā hi pariyāyadesanā;
tika-abh06t0:2420_0: Yadi evaṃ tayametaṃ, ajātattā ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:2422_0: Natthīti ce khaṃpupphaṃva, niccaṃ vāsaṅkhataṃ viya;
tika-abh06t0:2426_0: Tasmā hi ca khaṃpupphaṃva, na natthi pana taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2429_0: Tasmā na pana niccaṃ vā, nibbānaṃ viya taṃ tayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2433_0: Yadi honti anipphannā, bhaveyyuṃ te asaṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t0:2436_0: Kathaṃ nāma bhaveyyuṃ te, nipphannā ceva saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t0:2443_0: Evaṃ sante tu dhammānaṃ, hoti saṅkaradosatā;
tika-abh06t0:2446_0: Aññaṃ pana ca aññasmiṃ, na catthi paramatthato;
tika-abh06t0:2450_0: Tesaṃ ṭhānantaraṃ vattuṃ, na sakkā samayaññunā.
tika-abh06t0:2458_0: Tasmā hi pana dhammānaṃ, aññamaññaṃ vimissatā;
tika-abh06t0:2478_0: Sesāni pana rūpāni, sukhumāni tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t0:2481_10: nakutoci jātaṃ nevakammajānākammajaṃ jaratā aniccatā ca.
tika-abh06t0:2482_4: neva dvārañca na vatthu cāti evaṃ bhedato ca,
tika-abh06t0:2482_8: neva dvārañca nevindriyañcāti evaṃ bhedato ca,
tika-abh06t0:2482_12: nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ceti evaṃ bhedato ca catubbidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2483_10: sesaṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ neva dvāraṃ na vatthu ca.
tika-abh06t0:2483_11: Tatiyacatukke indriyameva hutvā na dvāranti itthindriyapurisindriyajīvitindriyāni.
tika-abh06t0:2484_2: dvārameva hutvā nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca,
tika-abh06t0:2484_4: indriyameva hutvā na vatthu na dvārañca,
tika-abh06t0:2484_5: nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvārañcāti evaṃ pabhedato pañcavidhaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2490_0: Saddo eko dvijo nāma, lahutādittayaṃ tijaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2496_0: Viññattīnaṃ dvayaṃ dvāraṃ, nevindriyaṃ na vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t0:2497_0: Hadayavatthu vatthūva, na dvāraṃ nevindriyaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:2498_0: Itthipurisajīvitindriyāni indriyameva na vatthu na dvārañca,
tika-abh06t0:2498_1: sesaṃ pana rūpaṃ nevindriyaṃ na vatthu na dvāranti.
tika-abh06t0:2500_6: Dutiyachakke cakkhuviññeyyaṃ nāma cakkhuviññāṇena viññeyyaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ…pe…
tika-abh06t0:2500_8: manoviññeyyaṃ nāma sesā pañca oḷārikā ca soḷasa sukhumarūpāni cāti ekavīsatividhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:2501_1: cakkhuviññeyyaṃ sotaghānajivhākāyaviññeyyaṃ manodhātuviññeyyaṃ manoviññāṇadhātuviññeyyanti sattavidhaṃ hoti.
tika-abh06t0:2502_0: Tattha cakkhādipañcavatthūni hadayavatthunā saddhiṃ cha vatthūni,
tika-abh06t0:2503_1: Tattha cakkhudvārādīni pañca kāyaviññattivacīviññattidvārehi saddhiṃ satta dvārāni,
tika-abh06t0:2513_0: Yoniyo purimā tisso, na santīti viniddise.
tika-abh06t0:2525_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbesu dasakesupi.
tika-abh06t0:2533_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, saddhiṃ bhāvena vatthunā;
tika-abh06t0:2534_0: Cakkhādīhi ca yojetvā, dasakā satta viññunā.
tika-abh06t0:2539_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo ca vatthu ca;
tika-abh06t0:2540_0: Bhāvo cāti hi sattannaṃ, dasakānaṃ vasā pana.
tika-abh06t0:2543_0: Dasakāni ca tīṇeva, navakaṃ jīvitassa ca.
tika-abh06t0:2545_0: Catunnaṃ tu kalāpānaṃ, vasena pana rūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2560_0: Ghānaṃ jivhā ca kāyo ca, tathā bhāvadvayampi ca;
tika-abh06t0:2561_0: Brahmānaṃ pana rūpīnaṃ, pañca rūpā na vijjare.
tika-abh06t0:2566_0: Rūpaṃ nibbattamānaṃ tu, sabbesaṃ pana pāṇinaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2572_0: Yatheva tassa uppāde, tiṃsa rūpāni jāyare;
tika-abh06t0:2578_0: Rogato gaṇḍato rūpaṃ, parato ca palokato;
tika-abh06t0:2579_0: Disvāna dukkhato rūpaṃ, rūpe chandaṃ virājaye.
tika-abh06t0:2595_0: Tattha nibbānanti bhavābhavaṃ vinanato vānaṃ vuccati taṇhā,
tika-abh06t0:2595_1: vānato nikkhantattā nibbānanti ca pavuccati amataṃ asaṅkhataṃ paramaṃ sukhaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2595_2: Vuttaṃ hetaṃ “yo so sabbasaṅkhārasamatho sabbūpadhipaṭinissaggo taṇhākkhayo virāgo nirodho nibbāna”nti.
tika-abh06t0:2599_0: Etaṃ ca nibbānaṃ nāma tayidaṃ santilakkhaṇaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:2600_1: na paramatthato nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvo atthi,
tika-abh06t0:2600_4: paññācakkhunā upaparikkhiyamānānaṃ hitagavesīnaṃ yathānurūpāya paṭipattiyā upalabbhanīyato.
tika-abh06t0:2600_7: Athāyasmatā sāriputtattherena dhammasenāpatinā “katamaṃ nu kho, āvuso,
tika-abh06t0:2600_9: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṃ khayova dassito,
tika-abh06t0:2600_10: tasmā rāgādīnaṃ khayamattameva nibbānanti ce? Taṃ na. Kasmā?
tika-abh06t0:2600_14: rāgakkhayo dosakkhayo mohakkhayo”ti rāgādīnaṃ khayova vutto,
tika-abh06t0:2600_15: tasmā tava matena arahattaphalassāpi rāgādīnaṃ khayamattatā bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t0:2600_16: na cetaṃ yuttaṃ anuttarassa lokuttaraphalacittassa rāgānaṃ khayamattatāpajjanaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:2601_0: Yassa pana dhammassādhigamena rāgādīnaṃ khayo hoti,
tika-abh06t0:2601_1: so dhammo rāgādīnaṃ khayassa upanissayattā akkhayopi samāno “rāgādīnaṃ khayo nibbāna”nti khayopacārena vutto,
tika-abh06t0:2601_2: “tipusaṃ jaro guḷo semho”tiādīsu viya phalūpacārena vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2601_8: Evañhi sati rāgādikkhayānaṃ bahubhāvato nibbānassāpi bahubhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t0:2602_5: Kiṃ pana rāgādayo gotrabhuādīnaṃ khaṇe khīyanti,
tika-abh06t0:2602_17: Evaṃ sante bhavato matena phalameva khayārammaṇaṃ, na itare,
tika-abh06t0:2602_19: Addhā so ārammaṇaṃ apassanto niruttaro bhavissati.
tika-abh06t0:2602_22: Nibbānaṃ pana na kenaci karīyati na uppādīyati,
tika-abh06t0:2608_11: Yaṃ kho pana kiñci bhūtaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:2608_13: Evaṃ vuttassa tassa nibbānassa abhāvapattidosato paṭhamajjhānākāsānañcāyatanānampi abhāvo bhaveyya,
tika-abh06t0:2609_3: ajātaṃ abhūtaṃ akataṃ asaṅkhata”nti ca dhammasāminā tathāgatena sammāsambuddhena anekesu suttantesu paramatthavasena
tika-abh06t0:2609_4: vuttattā “atthi nibbānaṃ nāma eko dhammo”ti niṭṭhamettha gantabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2609_6: “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni nibbānañca,
tika-abh06t0:2609_7: ime dhammā appamāṇā”ti vuttattā rāgādīnaṃ khayassa appamāṇattaṃ kathaṃ yujjati,
tika-abh06t0:2609_8: tasmā paramatthato atthiyeva nibbānaṃ nāma eko sabhāvoti.
tika-abh06t0:2609_10: titthiyānaṃ attā viya ca sasavisāṇaṃ viya ca nāvijjamānaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2610_3: Parittārammaṇattike ca pana “katame dhammā appamāṇārammaṇā”ti padamuddharitvā “cattāro maggā apariyāpannā cattāri ca sāmaññaphalāni,
tika-abh06t0:2610_8: “Navattabbārammaṇā pana rūpāvacarattikacatukkajjhānā kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t0:2610_10: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ kusalato ca vipākato ca kiriyato ca,
tika-abh06t0:2610_13: Yasmā ca paṇṇattibhāvo nibbānassa na yujjati,
tika-abh06t0:2610_16: papañcābhāvato nippapañcaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthīti upagantabbanti.
tika-abh06t0:2613_0: Paṇītaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2622_0: Imehi pana nāmehi, nibbānaṃ tu kathīyati.
tika-abh06t0:2624_0: Evañca pana viññāya, nibbānampi ca accutaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2635_7: “yā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ saṅkhā samaññā paññatti vohāro nāmaṃ nāmakammaṃ nāmadheyyaṃ nirutti byañjanaṃ abhilāpo”ti.
tika-abh06t0:2635_18: “Aha”nti hi rūpādayo dhamme upādāya paṭicca kāraṇaṃ katvā yathā te rūpādayo dhammā uppādavayavanto,
tika-abh06t0:2635_20: kevalaṃ lokasaṅketena siddhā yā ayaṃ “aha”nti kathīyati ceva paññāpīyati ca,
tika-abh06t0:2636_1: Tattha nāmanti taṃ taṃ dhammaṃ “esa itthannāmo nāmā”ti paññapeti,
tika-abh06t0:2637_0: Sā panesā tajjāpaññatti upādāpaññatti upanidhāpaññattīti tividhā hoti.
tika-abh06t0:2637_3: Tattha samūhapaññatti nāma rūpārūpadhammesu ekassa vā bahūnaṃ vā nāmaṃ gahetvā samūhamevopādāya vuccati. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t0:2638_0: Yadā pana sā vijjamānaṃ paramatthaṃ jotayati,
tika-abh06t0:2638_12: Tattha paramatthato vijjamānānaṃ rūpādīnaṃ paññāpanā vijjamānapaññatti.
tika-abh06t0:2638_14: Ṭhapetvā pana vacanatthaṃ kenaci ākārena anupalabbhamānānaṃ pañcamasaccādīnaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:2638_23: bhikkhukumāro”ti evamādikā avijjamānena avijjamānapaññattīti evaṃ vuttā cha paññattiyopi ettheva saṅgahaṃ gacchanti.
tika-abh06t0:2639_2: rassaṃ upanidhāya dīgho”tiādinayappavattā “kapaṇaṃ mānusakaṃ rajjaṃ dibbasukhaṃ upanidhāyā”ti evamādikā ca,
tika-abh06t0:2639_3: tasmā paññapetabbato ca paññāpanato ca paññattīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:2641_0: Paramatthato ca paññatti, tatiyā koṭi na vijjati;
tika-abh06t0:2642_0: Dvīsu ṭhānesu kusalo, paravādesu na kampati.
tika-abh06t0:2647_3: Tassa hi kārakassa vedakassa attano abhāve kusalākusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ abhāvo siyā,
tika-abh06t0:2647_14: Tathā kusalādīnampi asatipi kattari atthitā upagantabbā,
tika-abh06t0:2647_17: Athāpi yathā pana loke kārakābhāvepi pathavīāpatejautuādayo paṭicca aṅkurādīnaṃ abhinibbatti dissati,
tika-abh06t0:2647_18: tathā etesampi kusalādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ hetupaccayasāmaggiyā abhinibbatti hotīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:2648_0: Athāpi cettha tassā paññāya parikappito nicco dhuvo kusalādīnaṃ kattā attā paramatthato atthīti ce?
tika-abh06t0:2648_2: so pana tāva attā kārako vedako kiṃ sacetano vā,
tika-abh06t0:2649_1: attano pana nāso na bhavati niccattā,
tika-abh06t0:2649_3: attano anāse sati cetanāyapi nāso na bhavati.
tika-abh06t0:2649_6: Cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati cetanāyayeva nāso bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2649_11: Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavatīti ce?
tika-abh06t0:2649_13: Atha aññassa attassa nāse sati sayaṃ nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2649_14: evañca sati “cetanāya anañño attā”ti tava paṭiññā hīnā.
tika-abh06t0:2649_15: Athāpi cetanattānaṃ anaññatte sati attano anāso cetanāyapi anāso bhavatu.
tika-abh06t0:2649_21: Atha pana evaṃ na bhavatīti ce?
tika-abh06t0:2650_0: Athāyaṃ bhavato adhippāyo siyā “nāyaṃ mama attā cetanāya anañño,
tika-abh06t0:2650_3: idha pana aññattaṃ duvidhaṃ hoti lakkhaṇakatamaññattañca desantarakatamaññattañcāti.
tika-abh06t0:2650_4: Tattha kiṃ tvaṃ cetanattānaṃ lakkhaṇakatamaññattaṃ vadesi,
tika-abh06t0:2650_7: Yathā hi rūparasagandhādīnamekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh06t0:2650_8: evaṃ cetanattānamekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ hoti,
tika-abh06t0:2650_11: yathā hi jātavedassa ḍayhamāne āmakasaṅghaṭe āmakavaṇṇavināse rasādīnaṃ vināso bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2650_12: tatheva cetanāya vināse attanopi vināso siyā.
tika-abh06t0:2651_0: Athevaṃ bhavato mati siyā “ekadesatte satipi attano pana nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2651_6: Atha samāne ekadesatte avinibbhogabhāvepi kena hetunā cetanāya eva nāso bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2651_11: Atha cetanāya nāse attano nāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2651_15: yathā rūparasagandhādīnaṃ ekadese vattamānānampi lakkhaṇato aññattaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:2651_18: Atha rūparasādīnaṃ viya samānepi ekadesatte yadi attano anāse cetanāyapi anāso na bhavati,
tika-abh06t0:2652_1: cetanattānaṃ aññatte sati ghaṭapaṭasakaṭagehādīnaṃ viya aññattaṃ siyā.
tika-abh06t0:2652_2: Cetanāya vinā anaññatā te attā na ghaṭena vinā paṭo viya añño siyā.
tika-abh06t0:2652_3: Añño ca hi ghaṭo añño ca paṭoti? Na,
tika-abh06t0:2652_6: Tasmā paramatthato na koci kattā vā vedako vā attā atthīti daṭṭhabbanti.
tika-abh06t0:2686_0: “Kiṃ nu sattoti paccesi, māra diṭṭhigataṃ nu te;
tika-abh06t0:2693_8: Evaṃ asaṅkarato ñatvā koci kārako vā vedako vā nicco dhuvo attā paramatthato natthīti upaparikkhitvā
tika-abh06t0:2693_9: paccayasāmaggiyā dhammānaṃ pavattiṃ sallakkhetvā paṇḍitena kulaputtena atthakāmena dukkhassantakiriyāya
tika-abh06t0:2695_0: Yo imaṃ ganthaṃ accantaṃ, cinteti satatampi so;
tika-abh06t0:2696_0: Kamena paramā paññā, tassa gacchati vepulaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2716_0: Natthi jhānaṃ kuto maggo, tasmā sīlaṃ visodhaye.
tika-abh06t0:2724_0: Ratanaṃ saraṇaṃ khemaṃ, tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2747_0: Piyo garu bhāvanīyo, vattā ca vacanakkhamo;
tika-abh06t0:2748_0: Gambhīrañca kathaṃ kattā, no caṭṭhāne niyojako.
tika-abh06t0:2753_0: Kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetabbaṃ, vattaṃ katvā panassa tu;
tika-abh06t0:2754_0: Tenāpi caritaṃ ñatvā, dātabbaṃ tassa bhikkhuno.
tika-abh06t0:2760_0: Tehi attho na catthīti, na mayā idha dassitā.
tika-abh06t0:2775_0: Ime pana ca cattāro, anukūlāti dīpitā.
tika-abh06t0:2777_0: Cattāropi ca āruppā, sesāni kasiṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t0:2808_0: Na ca vaḍḍhaniyā sesā, bhavanti asubhādayo.
tika-abh06t0:2825_0: Catutthaṃ kasiṇaṃ hitvā, kasiṇā asubhāni ca;
tika-abh06t0:2835_0: Upekkhā appamaññā ca, arūpā ceva pañcime.
tika-abh06t0:2841_0: Kasiṇā nava honte ca, arūpānaṃ tu paccayā.
tika-abh06t0:2843_0: Dasāpi kasiṇā honti, abhiññānaṃ tu paccayā;
tika-abh06t0:2865_0: Dīghā kesā nakhā lomā, chinditabbā vibhāvinā.
tika-abh06t0:2867_0: Cīvaraṃ rajitabbaṃ taṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ tu sace siyā;
tika-abh06t0:2868_0: Sace patte malaṃ hoti, pacitabbova suṭṭhu so.
tika-abh06t0:2873_0: Vajjetvā mattikaṃ nīlaṃ, pītaṃ setañca lohitaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2880_0: Saṃhārimaṃ vā kātabbaṃ, taṃ tatraṭṭhakameva vā.
tika-abh06t0:2883_0: Cammaṃ vā kaṭasāraṃ vā, dussapattampi vā tathā.
tika-abh06t0:2889_0: Vallīhi taṃ vinandhitvā, kātabbaṃ kaṇṇikaṃ samaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2892_0: Vaṭṭaṃ vattati taṃ kātuṃ, vivaṭṭaṃ pana micchatā.
tika-abh06t0:2895_0: Sammajjitvāna taṃ ṭhānaṃ, nhatvā āgamma paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t0:2912_0: Na vaṇṇo pekkhitabbo so, daṭṭhabbaṃ na ca lakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2913_0: Vaṇṇaṃ pana amuñcitvā, ussadassa vasena hi.
tika-abh06t0:2918_0: Pathavī medanī bhūmi, vasudhā ca vasundharā;
tika-abh06t0:2922_0: Yāvuggahanimittaṃ tu, nuppajjati ca tāva so.
tika-abh06t0:2927_0: Yathā ummīlitekāle, tathāpāthaṃ tu yāti ce;
tika-abh06t0:2930_0: Nimitte pana sañjāte, tato pabhuti yoginā;
tika-abh06t0:2931_0: Nisīditabbaṃ no cevaṃ, tasmiṃ ṭhāne vijānatā.
tika-abh06t0:2940_0: Sace nassati taṃ ṭhānaṃ, gantvāvādāya taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:2945_0: Nimittaṃ pana taṃ hitvā, cittaṃ dhāvati ce bahi;
tika-abh06t0:2957_0: Ko panāyaṃ viseso hi, imassa purimassa vā;
tika-abh06t0:2981_0: Dvinnaṃ pana samādhīnaṃ, kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:2987_0: Pallaṅkena ca teneva, vaḍḍhetvā taṃ nimittakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:2988_0: Appanaṃ adhigantuṃ so, sakkoti yadi sundaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:2996_0: Nimittaṃ rakkhato laddhaṃ, parihāni na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:2999_0: Rakkhitabbaṃ hi tasmā taṃ, tatrāyaṃ rakkhaṇāvidhi.
tika-abh06t0:3001_0: Āvāso gocaro bhassaṃ, puggalo bhojanaṃ utu;
tika-abh06t0:3005_0: Na cireneva kālena, hoti bhikkhussa appanā.
tika-abh06t0:3008_0: Appanāya ca kosallaṃ, sammā sampādaye budho.
tika-abh06t0:3017_0: Tathāpi na jahe yogaṃ, vāyametheva paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t0:3035_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t0:3044_0: Yaṃ taṃ sabbantimaṃ ettha, gotrabhūti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t0:3053_0: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vāti, appeti na tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3055_0: Chaṭṭhe vā sattame vāpi, appanā neva jāyati;
tika-abh06t0:3058_0: Purimehāsevanaṃ laddhā, chaṭṭhaṃ vā sattamampi vā;
tika-abh06t0:3076_0: Kukkuccaṃ vicikicchā ca, pahīnā pañcime pana.
tika-abh06t0:3078_0: Vitakkena vicārena, pītiyā ca sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t0:3082_0: Ito cito bhamantassa, vane makkaṭako viya.
tika-abh06t0:3112_0: Upacārampi vā patvā, vaḍḍhetuṃ tañca vattati.
tika-abh06t0:3114_0: Appanaṃ pana patvā vā, tatrāyaṃ vaḍḍhanakkamo;
tika-abh06t0:3130_0: Ubhato bhaṭṭhobhave yogī, paṭhamā dutiyāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:3136_0: Mandassa yogino jhānaṃ, hoti taṃ ṭhitibhāgiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3145_0: Paṭhamā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya vidhinā tato.
tika-abh06t0:3150_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, paṭhame pana yoginā;
tika-abh06t0:3162_0: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t0:3172_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t0:3181_0: Evaṃ duvaṅgahīnaṃ tu, tīhi aṅgehi saṃyutaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3189_0: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya dutiyā puna;
tika-abh06t0:3195_0: Tattha ādīnavaṃ disvā, tatiye santato pana;
tika-abh06t0:3199_0: Athassa dutiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya ca yadā pana.
tika-abh06t0:3204_0: Thūlaṅgānaṃ pahānāya, tadā tassa ca yogino;
tika-abh06t0:3214_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t0:3219_0: Satiyā sampajaññena, sampannaṃ tu sukhena ca;
tika-abh06t0:3231_0: Tasmā paguṇato jhānā, vuṭṭhāya tatiyā puna;
tika-abh06t0:3237_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, jhānasmiṃ tatiye puna;
tika-abh06t0:3238_0: Catutthaṃ santato disvā, cetasā pana yoginā.
tika-abh06t0:3243_0: Athassa tatiyajjhānā, vuṭṭhāya hi yadā pana;
tika-abh06t0:3246_0: Thūlato tassupaṭṭhāti, sukhaṃ taṃ mānasaṃ tato;
tika-abh06t0:3253_0: Catutthaṃ panidaṃ jhānaṃ, uppajjissati taṃ iti.
tika-abh06t0:3259_0: Javanāni ca jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t0:3274_0: Ayamettha viseso hi, sesaṃ vuttanayaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:3276_0: Yaṃ catukkanaye jhānaṃ, dutiyaṃ taṃ dvidhā pana;
tika-abh06t0:3279_0: Tatiyaṃ taṃ catutthañca, catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t0:3285_0: Sumadhuravarataravacano, kaṃ nu janaṃ neva rañjayati;
tika-abh06t0:3307_0: Catutthe pana jhānasmiṃ, hutvā ciṇṇavasī vasī;
tika-abh06t0:3313_0: Iti ādīnavaṃ disvā, catutthe tattha sabbaso;
tika-abh06t0:3324_0: Ugghāṭento hi kasiṇaṃ, na saṃvelleti taṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:3325_0: Na cuddharati so yogī, pūvaṃ viya kapālato.
tika-abh06t0:3327_0: Kevalaṃ pana taṃ neva, āvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t0:3338_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3342_0: Idhāpi purime bhāge, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t0:3365_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3369_0: Appeti appanā yasmiṃ, nayo vuttanayova so.
tika-abh06t0:3386_0: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, kātabbo manasā puna;
tika-abh06t0:3398_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3415_0: Sannipātaṃ yathā koci, disvā saṅghassa katthaci;
tika-abh06t0:3416_0: Gate saṅghe tu taṃ ṭhānaṃ, suññamevānupassati.
tika-abh06t0:3427_0: Evaṃ manasi katvāna, puna tattheva dhīmatā;
tika-abh06t0:3436_0: Āsevati ca bhāveti, taṃ nimittaṃ punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3454_0: Santato taṃ karonto hi, manasā sukhumaṃ paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3469_0: Paṭusaññāya kiccaṃ sā, kātuṃ sakkoti neva ca.
tika-abh06t0:3473_0: Tasmā pana ca sā saññā, “nāsaññā”ti pavuccati.
tika-abh06t0:3512_0: Alaṅkāro hi tāṇanti, satthanti ca pavuccati.
tika-abh06t0:3530_0: Vuṭṭhāya hi sataṃ vāpi, sahassaṃ vā yadicchati.
tika-abh06t0:3556_0: Tassevaṃ pana saddassa, nimittaṃ manasi kubbato;
tika-abh06t0:3562_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t0:3563_0: Purimānettha cittesu, tīṇi cattāri vā pana.
tika-abh06t0:3568_0: Sahajātaṃ tu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, appanāmānasena hi;
tika-abh06t0:3571_0: Thāmajātaṃ karontena, taṃ ñāṇaṃ tena yoginā;
tika-abh06t0:3582_0: Phuṭṭhokāsagate sadde, sabbe pana suṇāti so;
tika-abh06t0:3589_0: Ālokaṃ pana vaḍḍhetvā, tasmā dibbena cakkhunā;
tika-abh06t0:3590_0: Hadayaṃ pana nissāya, vattamānaṃ tu lohitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3623_0: Yāva asmiṃ bhave sandhi, tāva tena ca bhikkhunā;
tika-abh06t0:3633_0: Katvā javanacittāni, honti cattāri pañca vā;
tika-abh06t0:3639_0: Tena cittena yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, saṃyuttaṃ tena yā pana;
tika-abh06t0:3659_0: Passitabbaṃ bhave rūpaṃ, passato pana tassa taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3664_0: Tasmiṃ antarahite rūpa-gatampi ca na dissati;
tika-abh06t0:3681_0: Manodvāre manakkāre, jāte yāni tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t0:3682_0: Rūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā, jāyanti javanāni hi.
tika-abh06t0:3721_0: Mahaggate ca cittasmiṃ, samāropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t0:3727_0: Pādakajjhānacittaṃ taṃ, kāye ropeti so tadā;
tika-abh06t0:3745_0: Paccuppanno paritto ca, saddo ārammaṇaṃ yato;
tika-abh06t0:3781_0: Yathā ca pupphamuṭṭhimhi, ukkhitte gagane pana;
tika-abh06t0:3788_0: Tesaṃ dvinnaṃ sahaṭṭhānā-bhāvato taṃ na yujjati.
tika-abh06t0:3791_0: Aniṭṭhe pana hi ṭhāne, ayuttanti pakāsitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3794_0: Vasena paccuppannaṃ taṃ, hoti ārammaṇaṃ idaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3802_0: Ārammaṇaṃ tadā katvā, tena saddhiṃ nirujjhati;
tika-abh06t0:3803_0: Javanāni hi jāyante, tassa cattāri pañca vā.
tika-abh06t0:3808_0: Etesaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, niruddhaṃ tu tadeva ca;
tika-abh06t0:3809_0: Cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ hoti, tasmā sabbāni tānipi.
tika-abh06t0:3815_0: Parassa cittaṃ jānāti, netarāni yathā pana.
tika-abh06t0:3817_0: Cakkhudvāre tu viññāṇaṃ, rūpaṃ passati netaraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3818_0: Evameva ca taṃ iddhi-cittameva ca jānāti.
tika-abh06t0:3832_0: Atīte attanā maggaṃ, bhāvitaṃ tu phalampi vā;
tika-abh06t0:3839_0: Atītārammaṇā honti, kiñcāpi atha kho pana.
tika-abh06t0:3857_0: Rūpaṃ saddoti dvinnaṃ tu, ayameva visesatā.
tika-abh06t0:3874_0: Atha kho pana taṃ satta-divasabbhantaraṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:3875_0: Cittameva ca jānāti, na hi taṃ aññagocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3913_0: Bhāvetabbā yato paññā, bhikkhunā tena dhīmatā.
tika-abh06t0:3924_0: Pajānātīti paññā sā, jānanā vā pakārato.
tika-abh06t0:3930_0: Lakkhaṇappaṭivedhaṃ tu, kātuṃ sakkoti neva sā.
tika-abh06t0:3935_0: Ussakkitvā na sakkoti, maggaṃ pāpetumeva taṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3936_0: Paññā vuttanayaṃ kātuṃ, sakkoti tividhampi taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3959_0: Parato pana sutvāna, laddhā paññā ayaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t0:3960_0: Suteneva ca nipphannā, paññā sutamayā matā.
tika-abh06t0:3962_0: Yathā vāpi tathā cettha, bhāvanāya vasena tu;
tika-abh06t0:3968_0: Yaṃ kiñci paccayuppannaṃ, vipākā ca kriyā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:3974_0: Tasmiṃ atthe ca dhamme ca, yā sabhāvanirutti tu;
tika-abh06t0:3978_0: Tesu ñāṇesu yaṃ ñāṇaṃ, paṭibhānanti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t0:3993_0: Rūpañca vedanā saññā, saṅkhārā ceva sabbaso;
tika-abh06t0:3996_0: Tattha yaṃ kiñci rūpaṃ taṃ, atītānāgatādikaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:3997_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, sukhumoḷārikampi vā.
tika-abh06t0:3999_0: Hīnaṃ vāpi paṇītaṃ vā, yaṃ dūre yañca santike;
tika-abh06t0:4005_0: Cittajaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, taṃ sañjānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4011_0: Tattha cittaṃ tu yaṃ kiñci, taṃ vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4026_0: Phālento viya tālassa, kandaṃ tu yamakaṃ dvidhā;
tika-abh06t0:4038_0: Evamettha paṇḍito poso, vavatthapeti taṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:4054_0: Na hettha satto manujo ca vijjati;
tika-abh06t0:4066_0: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4068_0: Na byāharati no seti, na tiṭṭhati na gacchati;
tika-abh06t0:4069_0: Na bhedeti na coreti, na bhuñjati na khādati.
tika-abh06t0:4071_0: Tathā rūpampi nittejaṃ, vinā nāmañca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t0:4072_0: Sakeneva hi tejena, na sakkoti pavattituṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4077_0: Nāmaṃ nissāya rūpaṃ tu, rūpaṃ nissāya nāmakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4083_0: Yathā hi nāvaṃ nissāya, manussā yanti aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t0:4086_0: Yathā manusse nissāya, nāvā gacchati aṇṇave;
tika-abh06t0:4105_0: Kaṅkhā tīsu panaddhāsu, vitaritvā ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:4110_0: Nāmarūpassa ko hetu, konu vā paccayo bhave;
tika-abh06t0:4113_0: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;
tika-abh06t0:4127_0: Itime pañca dhammā hi, hetupaccayataṃ gatā;
tika-abh06t0:4130_0: Janakaṃ pana kammaṃ tu, puttassa hi pitā viya;
tika-abh06t0:4131_0: Dhātī viya kumārassa, āhāro dhārako bhave.
tika-abh06t0:4139_0: So evaṃ nāmarūpassa, vuttiṃ disvāna paccayā;
tika-abh06t0:4145_0: Tassevaṃ passato yā sā, pubbante pañcadhā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:4156_0: Tattha ekajavanavīthiyaṃ sattasu cittesu kusalā vā akusalā vā paṭhamajavanacetanā diṭṭhadhammavedanīyakammaṃ nāma.
tika-abh06t0:4156_4: natthi kammavipāko”ti imassa tikassa vasena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4156_7: tathā asakkontaṃ vuttanayena ahosikammaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4156_11: sati saṃsārappavattiyā ahosikammaṃ nāma na hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4158_0: Aparaṃ catubbidhaṃ kammaṃ, garukaṃ bahulampi ca;
tika-abh06t0:4163_0: Tattha janakaṃ nāma kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā kammaṃ paṭisandhiyampi pavattepi rūpārūpavipākakkhandhe janeti.
tika-abh06t0:4163_1: Upatthambhakaṃ pana vipākaṃ janetuṃ na sakkoti,
tika-abh06t0:4163_2: aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ upatthambheti,
tika-abh06t0:4163_4: Upapīḷakaṃ pana aññena kammena dinnāya paṭisandhiyā janite vipāke uppajjanakasukhadukkhaṃ pīḷeti bādhati,
tika-abh06t0:4163_6: Upaghātakaṃ pana sayaṃ kusalampi akusalampi samānaṃ aññaṃ dubbalakammaṃ ghātetvā tassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti.
tika-abh06t0:4163_7: Evaṃ pana kammena okāse kate taṃvipākamuppannaṃ nāma hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4163_8: Iti imaṃ dvādasavidhaṃ kammaṃ kammavaṭṭe pakkhipitvā evameko kammavipākavasena nāmarūpassa paccayapariggahaṃ karoti.
tika-abh06t0:4164_0: Iti evaṃ kammavipākavaṭṭavasena nāmarūpassa pavattiṃ disvā “yathā idaṃ etarahi,
tika-abh06t0:4164_2: anāgatepi pavattissatī”ti iti kammañceva vipāko cāti kammavipākavasena loko pavattatīti taṃ samanupassati.
tika-abh06t0:4164_3: Tassevaṃ samanupassato sabbā soḷasavidhā kaṅkhā pahiyyati.
tika-abh06t0:4169_0: Evaṃ kāraṇato uddhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ na ca passati;
tika-abh06t0:4176_0: Evaṃ kamme vipāke ca, vattamāne sahetuke;
tika-abh06t0:4186_0: Taṇhāsotena vuyhantā, na te dukkhā pamuccare.
tika-abh06t0:4191_0: Kammaṃ natthi vipākamhi, pāko kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t0:4192_0: Aññamaññaṃ ubho suññā, na ca kammaṃ vinā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4194_0: Yathā na sūriye aggi, na maṇimhi na gomaye;
tika-abh06t0:4195_0: Na tesaṃ bahi so atthi, sambhārehi ca jāyati.
tika-abh06t0:4197_0: Tathā na anto kammassa, vipāko upalabbhati;
tika-abh06t0:4198_0: Bahiddhāpi na kammassa, na kammaṃ tattha vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:4200_0: Phalena suññaṃ taṃ kammaṃ, phalaṃ kamme na vijjati;
tika-abh06t0:4201_0: Kammañca kho upādāya, tato nibbattate phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4240_0: Nicayo rāsi vā natthi, tathā uppajjatopi ca.
tika-abh06t0:4242_0: Rāsito nicayā vāpi, natthi āgamananti ca;
tika-abh06t0:4245_0: Niruddhassāpi ekasmiṃ, ṭhāne natthi cayoti ca;
tika-abh06t0:4249_0: Katvā tasseva ñāṇassa, vibhaṅgassa vasena tu.
tika-abh06t0:4257_0: Evaṃ rūpudayo hoti, evamassa vayo iti;
tika-abh06t0:4258_0: Udeti evaṃ rūpampi, evaṃ rūpaṃ tu veti ca.
tika-abh06t0:4261_0: Passato sabbadhammā ca, pākaṭā honti tassa te.
tika-abh06t0:4267_0: Asārā pana nissārā, hutvā khāyanti yogino.
tika-abh06t0:4270_0: Lakkhaṇāni ca paññāsa, paṭivijjha ṭhitaṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:4272_0: Ñāṇaṃ adhigataṃ hoti, taruṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:4280_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, ñāṇaṃ saddhā satī sukhaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4300_0: Pīti vippassanāpīti, tassa tasmiṃ khaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t0:4306_0: Lahūni ca mudūneva, kammaññāneva honti hi;
tika-abh06t0:4315_0: Amānusī rati hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
tika-abh06t0:4329_0: Asatte sattasaññī ca, hoti appassuto naro.
tika-abh06t0:4335_0: Tassa cevaṃ ayaṃ maggo, nāyaṃ maggoti yogino.
tika-abh06t0:4355_0: Udayabbaye ca bhaṅge ca, bhaye ādīnave tathā;
tika-abh06t0:4365_0: Etesu pana ñāṇesu, yogo karaṇiyo pana.
tika-abh06t0:4371_0: Aṭṭhannaṃ pana ñāṇānaṃ, vasena pana yogino.
tika-abh06t0:4377_0: Idāni tassa maggo ca, samuppajjissatīti hi.
tika-abh06t0:4379_0: Saṅkhārupekkhā saṅkhāre, aniccā dukkhāti vā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:4380_0: Sammasitvā bhavaṅgaṃ tu, puna votarateva sā.
tika-abh06t0:4392_0: Dutiyaṃ javanaṃ hoti, upacāranti taṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4416_0: Ito paraṃ tu bhikkhussa, hoti gotrabhumānasaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4426_0: Gottaṃ vuccati nibbānaṃ, tato bhavati gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t0:4429_0: Tattha taṃ paṭhamaṃ maggaṃ, sampādetuṃ panicchatā.
tika-abh06t0:4431_0: Aññaṃ kiñcipi kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā tena natthi taṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4432_0: Yañhi tena ca kātabbaṃ, siyā taṃ katameva tu.
tika-abh06t0:4435_0: Uppādentena taṃ sabbaṃ, katameva ca yoginā.
tika-abh06t0:4453_0: Maggassa pana taṃ saññaṃ, datvā viya nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t0:4455_0: Maggopi tena taṃ dinnaṃ, amuñcitvāva sañhitaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4477_0: Tassevānantaraṃ tassa, vipākā dvepi tīṇi vā;
tika-abh06t0:4478_0: Phalacittāni jāyante, na jāyante tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4480_0: Keci ekañca dve tīṇi, cattārīti vadanti tu;
tika-abh06t0:4481_0: Na panetaṃ gahetabbaṃ, ajānitvā vadanti te.
tika-abh06t0:4484_0: Tehi āsevanaṃ laddhā, tatiyaṃ hoti gotrabhu.
tika-abh06t0:4491_0: Pañcamaṃ maggacittañca, phalāni dve tato pana;
tika-abh06t0:4503_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, phalādīnampi pekkhane;
tika-abh06t0:4506_0: Maggo phalaṃ pahīnā ca, kilesā avasiṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t0:4526_0: Phalacittāni ñeyyāni, viññunā dvepi tīṇi vā.
tika-abh06t0:4602_0: Etesu yena ye dhammā, pahātabbā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t0:4604_0: Imesu pana catūsu maggañāṇesu ye dhammā yena ñāṇena pahātabbā,
tika-abh06t0:4605_3: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbataparāmāso kāmarāgo paṭighoti ime pañca adhobhāgiyasaṃyojanāni nāma.
tika-abh06t0:4606_2: lobho doso moho māno diṭṭhi vicikicchā thinaṃ uddhaccaṃ ahirikaṃ anottappanti.
tika-abh06t0:4607_2: micchādiṭṭhi micchāsaṅkappo micchāvācā micchākammanto micchāājīvo micchāvāyāmo micchāsati micchāsamādhi micchāñāṇaṃ micchāvimuttīti.
tika-abh06t0:4608_0: Lokadhammāti aṭṭha lokadhammā lābho alābho yaso ayaso nindā pasaṃsā sukhaṃ dukkhanti.
tika-abh06t0:4608_2: alābhādivatthukassa paṭighassa cetaṃ lokadhammagahaṇena gahaṇaṃ katanti veditabbaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4609_0: Macchariyānīti pañca macchariyāni āvāsamacchariyaṃ kulamacchariyaṃ lābhamacchariyaṃ dhammamacchariyaṃ vaṇṇamacchariyanti.
tika-abh06t0:4609_1: Imāni āvāsādīsu aññesaṃ sādhāraṇabhāvaṃ asahanākārena pavattāni macchariyāni.
tika-abh06t0:4610_0: Vipallāsāti aniccadukkhaanattaasubhesuyeva vatthūsu “niccaṃ sukhaṃ attā subha”nti evaṃ pavattā saññāvipallāso
tika-abh06t0:4614_2: pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ kāmesumicchācāro musāvādo pisuṇavācā pharusavācā samphappalāpo abhijjhā byāpādo micchādiṭṭhīti dasa.
tika-abh06t0:4615_0: Akusalacittuppādāti lobhamūlāni aṭṭha, dosamūlāni dve, mohamūlāni dveti ime dvādasāti.
tika-abh06t0:4616_0: Etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ etāni yathāsambhavaṃ pahānakarāni. Kathaṃ?
tika-abh06t0:4616_1: Saṃyojanesu tāva sakkāyadiṭṭhivicikicchāsīlabbataparāmāsā apāyagamanīyā kāmarāgapaṭighāti ete paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t0:4618_0: Micchattesu micchādiṭṭhi musāvādo micchākammanto micchāājīvoti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t0:4619_2: yase pasaṃsāya ca anunayo catutthamaggañāṇavajjhoti eke.
tika-abh06t0:4621_3: asubhe subhanti diṭṭhivipallāso cāti ime paṭhamamaggañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t0:4627_0: Upādānesu sabbesampi lokiyadhammānaṃ vatthukāmavasena “kāmā”ti āgatattā rūpārūpesu rāgopi kāmupādāne patati,
tika-abh06t0:4630_0: Akusalakammapathesu pāṇātipāto adinnādānaṃ micchācāro musāvādo micchādiṭṭhīti ime paṭhamañāṇavajjhā,
tika-abh06t0:4632_2: Tena vuttaṃ “etesaṃ saṃyojanādīnaṃ dhammānaṃ etāni yathāyogaṃ pahānakarānī”ti.
tika-abh06t0:4635_0: Yo yo hi dhammo samupeti ghātaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:4636_0: So so asesena ca tena tena,
tika-abh06t0:4651_0: Padīpo hi yathā loke, apubbācarimaṃ idha;
tika-abh06t0:4670_0: Obhāseti ca rūpāni, nāseti timirampi ca;
tika-abh06t0:4673_0: Yathā ca mahatī nāvā, apubbācarimaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:4676_0: Jahatī orimaṃ tīraṃ, sotaṃ chindati sā pana;
tika-abh06t0:4682_0: Yathā chindati taṃ sotaṃ, taṇhaṃ jahati taṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:4683_0: Yathā vahati taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, sahajātādinā pana.
tika-abh06t0:4685_0: Tatheva paccayattena, maggaṃ bhāveti nāma so;
tika-abh06t0:4686_0: Yathā pāraṃ pana evaṃ, nirodhārammaṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:4706_0: Dhammā te paccaye cāhaṃ, dassayissāmito paraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4708_0: Tattha hetupaccayoti lobho doso moho alobho adoso amohoti ime cha dhammā hetupaccayā.
tika-abh06t0:4708_1: Ārammaṇapaccayoti sabbalokiyalokuttaraṃ yaṃ yaṃ dhammaṃ ārabbha ye ye dhammā uppajjanti cittacetasikā dhammā,
tika-abh06t0:4708_2: te te dhammā tesaṃ tesaṃ dhammānaṃ ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
tika-abh06t0:4709_2: ārammaṇādhipati pana domanassavicikicchuddhaccakiriyābyākatākusalavipāke ca aniṭṭhasammatañca rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4712_3: anāsavakusalacetanā anantarameva attano vipākassa paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4714_1: Vippayuttapaccayoti vatthupurejātāni ceva pacchājātā cittacetasikā ca.
tika-abh06t0:4715_0: Ettha pana katihākārehi rūpaṃ rūpassa paccayo hotīti?
tika-abh06t0:4720_0: Paccayo nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t0:4726_0: Tipañcahi taṃ rūpassa, ubhinnaṃ terasadhā pana.
tika-abh06t0:4727_0: Rūpārūpaṃ rūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātanissayaatthiavigatavasena catudhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4728_0: Rūpārūpaṃ arūpassa yathārahaṃ sahajātaaññamaññanissayindriyaatthiavigatavasena chadhā paccayo hoti.
tika-abh06t0:4732_0: Chabbidhā nāmadhammassa, missakassa na kiñci tu.
tika-abh06t0:4733_6: sesā pana ekādasa paccayā rūpārūpamissakāti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:4734_1: sampayuttavippayuttaatthiavigatānaṃ vasena pannarasa paccayā paccuppannāva honti.
tika-abh06t0:4734_3: kammapaccayo atīto vā hoti paccuppanno vā,
tika-abh06t0:4734_4: ārammaṇādhipatiupanissayapaccayā pana tikālikā honti kālavinimuttā ca.
tika-abh06t0:4742_0: Sabbe panime catuvīsati paccayā yathārahaṃ ārammaṇūpanissayakammaatthipaccayānaṃ vasena catūsu paccayesu saṅgahaṃ gacchantīti veditabbā.
tika-abh06t0:4748_0: Icchatā nipuṇaṃ buddhiṃ, bhikkhunā pana sotabbo.
tika-abh06t0:4760_0: Atthato ganthato cāpi, yuttito cāpi ettha ca;
tika-abh06t0:4761_0: Ayuttaṃ vā viruddhaṃ vā, yadi dissati kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t0:4794_0: Ayaṃ sumatinā sādhu, yācitena kato satā.
tika-abh06t0:4801_0: Uragapuranivasanena ācariyena bhadantabuddhadattena sīlācārasampannena kato abhidhammāvatāro nāmāyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4815_0: Tattha cittaṃ cetasikaṃ, nibbānanti mataṃ tidhā;
tika-abh06t0:4863_0: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t0:4888_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:4901_0: Sattati vīsati ceva, tāni cittāni dīpaye.
tika-abh06t0:4906_0: Lobho lobhe tu diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhiyutte viyuttake;
tika-abh06t0:4907_0: Māno ca thinamiddhaṃ tu, sasaṅkhāresu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t0:4915_0: Kammaññatā ca pāguññaujutāti yugā cha ca;
tika-abh06t0:4920_0: Lokuttare sadā sabbā, saha kāmasubhe visuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:4929_0: Nānā kadāci māno ca, thinamiddhaṃ tathā saha.
tika-abh06t0:4931_0: Satta sabbattha jāyanti, cha tu dhammā yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:5029_0: Sampayuttātha vā tena, cintentīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:5031_0: Phusatīti bhave phasso, phusanaṃ vātha kevalaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:5032_0: Sampayuttātha vā tena, phusantīti ca gocaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:5034_0: Evaṃ kattari bhāve ca, karaṇe ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:5217_0: Yogāti cāhu te eva, pāṇino bhavayantake;
tika-abh06t0:5223_0: Kāmataṇhā ca diṭṭhi ca, upādānā catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t0:5248_0: Diṭṭhi sīlabbataṃ māno, uddhaccena dasā bhave.
tika-abh06t0:5288_0: Mūlabhāvena dhammānaṃ, hetū dhammā cha dīpitā.
tika-abh06t0:5290_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:5297_0: Sammāsati samādhī ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca sambhavā.
tika-abh06t0:5313_0: Saddhā ca sati paññā ca, vīriyekaggatāpi ca;
tika-abh06t0:5314_0: Vedanā jīvitaṃ cittaṃ, aṭṭha rūpindriyāni ca.
tika-abh06t0:5316_0: Kathaṃ jīvitamekaṃ tu, sukhaṃ dukkhanti vedanā;
tika-abh06t0:5335_0: Chando cittañca vīriyaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t0:5354_0: Sesā tu kusalā ñāṇaviyuttā ca dvihetukā;
tika-abh06t0:5360_0: Catujhānaṃ tu dutiyaṃ, kāme ca sukhavajjitā;
tika-abh06t0:5361_0: Pañcajhānaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, kāme ca sukhitā matā.
tika-abh06t0:5366_0: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t0:5369_0: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t0:5375_0: Na hontāhetuke maggā, cittaṭṭhiti ca kaṅkhite;
tika-abh06t0:5376_0: Viditā niyatatā ca, lokiyesu na uddhaṭā.
tika-abh06t0:5419_0: Kāye ca vedanācitte, dhammesu ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:5434_0: Pañca saddhā sati paññā, vīriyekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:5486_0: Āvajjanaṃ tu yugaḷaṃ, dassanaṃ savanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:5510_0: Ghānādayo tayo rūpe, pañca cakkhādayo tathā;
tika-abh06t0:5513_0: Cha dvārā vīthicittāni, satta kāmīsu rūpisu;
tika-abh06t0:5517_0: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chetvāna, paccekaṃ vīthi jāyati.
tika-abh06t0:5538_0: Vibhūte tu tadālambaṃ, vitthārā sattasaṭṭhi te.
tika-abh06t0:5579_0: Kriyābhiññā ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, kriyā kāme tihetukā;
tika-abh06t0:5591_0: Catasso dhātuyo rūpe, tīṇi vatthūni nissitā;
tika-abh06t0:5615_0: Iccevaṃ chasu devesu, manussesu ca jāyare;
tika-abh06t0:5630_0: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t0:5688_0: Maggaṭṭhesu sako maggo, puggalesu ayaṃ nayo.
tika-abh06t0:5700_0: Bhavaṅgaṃ taṃ pana chetvā, hoti āvajjanaṃ tato.
tika-abh06t0:5712_0: Na hoti domanassamhā, somanassaṃ tu sabbadā.
tika-abh06t0:5721_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t0:5739_0: Bhavaṅgādi ca voṭṭhabbaṃ, javanādi sakiṃ pana.
tika-abh06t0:5745_0: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, samuppajjati sambhavā.
tika-abh06t0:5748_0: Vīthicittāvasāne tu, bhavaṅgaṃ cuti vā bhave.
tika-abh06t0:5781_0: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:5803_0: Tikā mahaggatā javā, maggā kāmajavā dvayā.
tika-abh06t0:5818_0: Sabbesaṃ paṭisandhī ca, cuti cārahato tathā.
tika-abh06t0:5867_0: Paccuppanne ca taṃ dukkhaṃ, āyatiṃ dukkhapākajaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:5903_0: Pākadāyakakammaṃ tu, yaṃ kiñci janakaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:5981_0: Chandādosā bhayā mohā, pāpaṃ kubbanti pāṇino;
tika-abh06t0:5988_0: Dānaṃ sīlaṃ bhāvanā ca, tīsu dvāresu jāyati.
tika-abh06t0:5994_0: Pāpā ca viramantassa, hoti sīlamayaṃ tadā.
tika-abh06t0:5997_0: Puññaṃ bhāventi santāne, yasmā tena hitāvahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:6000_0: Kāyakammaṃ tadā hoti, dānaṃ sīlañca bhāvanā.
tika-abh06t0:6006_0: Viramantassa viññattiṃ, vinā vā saha vā puna.
tika-abh06t0:6032_0: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, sīle cāge ca attano;
tika-abh06t0:6038_0: Mettā karuṇā muditā, upekkhā bhāvanāti ca;
tika-abh06t0:6097_0: Purimaṃ purimaṃ katvā, vasībhūtaṃ tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6148_0: Iti channaṃ catukkānaṃ, vasā kammaṃ vibhāvaye;
tika-abh06t0:6157_0: Bhūmi lokuttarā ceva, lokiyāti dvidhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:6171_0: Niraye hoti deve ca, yonekā opapātikā;
tika-abh06t0:6175_0: Asure ca bhavantevaṃ, catudhā yoni saṅgahā.
tika-abh06t0:6177_0: Gatiyo nirayaṃ petā, tiracchānā ca mānavā;
tika-abh06t0:6250_0: Datvā soḷasa pākāni, pavatte tu vipaccati.
tika-abh06t0:6289_0: Aladdhā tādisaṃ hetuṃ, abhiññā na vipaccati.
tika-abh06t0:6294_0: Iti tettiṃsa kammāni, pākā chattiṃsa bhāsitā;
tika-abh06t0:6301_0: Nāmaṃ tidhā pakāsesi, cakkhumā vadataṃ varo.
tika-abh06t0:6308_0: Buddho bodhitale yamāha sugato gantvāna devālayaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:6327_0: Bhūtarūpaṃ tu pathavī, āpo tejo tathāparo;
tika-abh06t0:6333_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyoti pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t0:6410_0: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:6411_0: Gandhova gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.
tika-abh06t0:6437_0: Sattā maranti nāsena, yassa pāṇanti vuttiyā;
tika-abh06t0:6490_0: Loke papañcā vattanti, bahudhā yāya nimmitā;
tika-abh06t0:6491_0: Kappenti kāyamattānaṃ, bālā yāya ca vañcitā.
tika-abh06t0:6509_0: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh06t0:6547_0: Yena lakkhīyati rūpaṃ, bhinnākāraṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t0:6559_0: Vaṇṇo gandho rasojā ca, bhūtarūpañca bhāsitaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6595_0: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, mutaṃ gandhādikattayaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6599_0: Pasādā vatthu ca dvāraṃ, aññaṃ tubhayavajjitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:6619_0: Sabbe kāmabhave rūpe, āhāro na samīrito.
tika-abh06t0:6622_0: Jīvamānassa sabbepi, matassotu siyā na vā.
tika-abh06t0:6643_0: Nava cha caturo dveti, ekavīsati bhāvayuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:6648_0: Tathā sotañca ghānañca, jivhaṃ kāyaṃ yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6652_0: Iccevaṃ kammajā nāma, kalāpā navadhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:6666_0: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6716_0: Tattha gandharasojā ca, na labbhantīti kecana;
tika-abh06t0:6723_0: Arūpe pana rūpāni, sabbathāpi na labbhare.
tika-abh06t0:6730_0: Rūpavibhāgamimaṃ suvibhattaṃ, rūpayato pana cetasi niccaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6752_0: Paccayā ceva saṅkhārā, saṅkhatā ca tatopare;
tika-abh06t0:6756_0: Ārammaṇā eva nāma, nālambanti hi kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t0:6783_0: Tadaññe araṇā nāma, pahātabbā na kehici.
tika-abh06t0:6788_0: Bālā dhammā tapanīyā, kaṇhā ca kaṭukapphalā;
tika-abh06t0:6800_0: Appamāṇā paṇītā ca, dhammā lokuttarā matā;
tika-abh06t0:6809_0: Kriyā rūpañca nibbānaṃ, na pākaṃ na tu paccati;
tika-abh06t0:6818_0: Satta lokuttarā heṭṭhā, vuttā sekkhāti tādinā;
tika-abh06t0:6825_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, sukhumoḷārikaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t0:6827_0: Hīnaṃ paṇītaṃ yaṃ dūre, santike vā tadekato;
tika-abh06t0:6830_0: Tatheva vedanākkhandho, nāma yā kāci vedanā;
tika-abh06t0:6837_0: Sandhāya vedanā saññā, katā nānāti kecana.
tika-abh06t0:6851_0: Bhājanaṃ bhojanaṃ tassa, byañjanaṃ bhojako tathā;
tika-abh06t0:6857_0: Cārako kāraṇaṃ tattha, aparādho ca kārako;
tika-abh06t0:6897_0: Sesaṃ rūpañca nibbānaṃ, sabbe cetasikāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:6920_0: Dukkhaṃ samudayo ceva, nirodho ca tathāparo;
tika-abh06t0:6938_0: Tathā hi dukkhaṃ nābādhaṃ, nāññaṃ dukkhā ca bādhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:6941_0: Taṃ vinā nāññato dukkhaṃ, na hoti na ca taṃ tato;
tika-abh06t0:6944_0: Nāññā nibbānato santi, na ca santaṃ na taṃ yato;
tika-abh06t0:6947_0: Nāññaṃ maggāca niyyānaṃ, aniyyāno na cāpi so;
tika-abh06t0:6973_0: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, soko ca paridevanā;
tika-abh06t0:6976_0: Appiyehi ca saṃyogo, vippayogo piyehi ca;
tika-abh06t0:6977_0: Yampi na labhaticchanto, tampi dukkhamidaṃ mataṃ.
tika-abh06t0:7001_0: Dukkhā ca dukkhavatthu ca, bahudhāpi papañcitā.
tika-abh06t0:7063_0: Asmiṃ sati idaṃ hoti, assuppādā idaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t0:7064_0: Asatāsmiṃ na taṃ hoti, tassa bhaṅgāva bhijjati.
tika-abh06t0:7084_0: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavoti ca;
tika-abh06t0:7085_0: Paccuppanno bhave addhā, bhave addhā anāgato.
tika-abh06t0:7087_0: Jāti jarā maraṇanti, dvedhā hoti ca sabbathā;
tika-abh06t0:7111_0: Sukhā dukkhā upekkhāti, vedanā tividhā bhave;
tika-abh06t0:7112_0: Kāme bhave ca vibhave, taṇhāti tividhā matā.
tika-abh06t0:7162_0: Vipākā puna kammāni, pākāni puna kammato;
tika-abh06t0:7193_0: Ajātānaṃ jarā vātha, maraṇaṃ vā kuto bhave.
tika-abh06t0:7294_0: Chadhā nāmaṃ tu nāmassa, pañcadhā nāmarūpinaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:7295_0: Ekadhā puna rūpassa, rūpaṃ nāmassa cekadhā.
tika-abh06t0:7298_0: Dvayassa navadhā ceti, chabbidhā paccayā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:7313_0: Dhammā te eva vuccanti, vigatappaccayoti ca.
tika-abh06t0:7379_0: Paññatti ceva nāmānaṃ, paccayo duvidho mato.
tika-abh06t0:7465_0: Iti taṃ tamupādāya, samaññātā tathā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:7472_0: Upādāya ca paññatti, sā evopanidhāya ca.
tika-abh06t0:7496_0: Khattiyo narasīho ca, bhātā lohitakaṃ yuvā.
tika-abh06t0:7522_0: Satthā yaṃ paramatthamuttamaguṇo nāmañca rūpanti ca,
tika-abh06t0:7525_0: Āraddhaṃ kamato mayevamakhilaṃ taṃ suṭṭhu niṭṭhāpitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:7527_0: Yaṃ dhammaṃ dhammarājā niratikamabhisambodhi maggena buddhā,
tika-abh06t0:7541_0: Bhāvanā duvidhā tattha, samatho ca vipassanā;
tika-abh06t0:7542_0: Samatho duvidho tattha, paritto ca mahaggato.
tika-abh06t0:7548_0: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāni ca.
tika-abh06t0:7628_0: Sesāni pana sabbesaṃ, tatthāpi kasiṇaṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t0:7654_0: Āvāsaṃ gocaraṃ bhassaṃ, puggalaṃ bhojanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:7657_0: Sevanto satta sappāye, te evāti padhānavā;
tika-abh06t0:7673_0: Na tu kassaci accantā, alaṅkārāva yācitā.
tika-abh06t0:7783_0: Viddhaṃsetvā vinassanti, idha ceva parattha ca.
tika-abh06t0:7786_0: Yattha bālā visīdanti, natthi saṅgo vijānataṃ.
tika-abh06t0:7920_0: Uddhatā ca pamattā ca, dabbitā ketugāhino.
tika-abh06t0:7977_0: Papātamiva gambhīraṃ, miḷhaṃ viya ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t0:8123_0: Asubhaṃ pana bhāvento, nimittaṃ yattha katthaci;
tika-abh06t0:8161_0: Yathā idaṃ tathā etaṃ, yathā etaṃ tathā idaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:8170_0: Anattā ca parābhūtā, vibbhijjati khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t0:8345_0: Cattāro ca paṭipannā, cattāro ca phale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:8398_0: Ādi cetaṃ patiṭṭhā ca, mukhaṃ pamukhamuttamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:8475_0: Subandhaṃ mama sabbattha, gahito ca kaṭaggaho”.
tika-abh06t0:8480_0: Saddhaṃ sīlaṃ sutaṃ cāgaṃ, paññaṃ paṇḍitajātiko;
tika-abh06t0:8498_0: Te sabbepi ca mayhampi, vijjanti anupāyino;
tika-abh06t0:8502_0: Dullabhāpi ca me laddhā, saddhā sugatasāsane.
tika-abh06t0:8516_0: Paññā vatthusabhāve ca, tikhiṇā mama vattati.
tika-abh06t0:8530_0: Virāgo ca nirodho ca, cāgo mutti anālayo;
tika-abh06t0:8579_0: Jātā puna marissanti, evaṃdhammā hi pāṇino.
tika-abh06t0:8582_0: Abbhuṭṭhitova so yāti, sa gacchaṃ na nivattati.
tika-abh06t0:8584_0: Sattā maranti gabbhepi, jāyamānā ca dārakā;
tika-abh06t0:8609_0: Assāsepi avissaṭṭhe, jīvikā ce kathāva kā.
tika-abh06t0:8626_0: Niccaṃ maccuvasaṃ yanto, vissaṭṭho kimahaṃ care.
tika-abh06t0:8651_0: Kesā lomā nakhā dantā, taco maṃsaṃ nahāru ca;
tika-abh06t0:8652_0: Aṭṭhi ca miñja vakkaṃ ca, hadayaṃ yakanaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t0:8702_0: Hitvā appaguṇe tattha, gaṇhaṃ suppaguṇaṃ budho;
tika-abh06t0:8729_0: Sukhumā nipuṇā tikkhā, paripakkā bale ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:8747_0: Pañcannaṃ na ṭhapetabbaṃ, heṭṭhā na dasatopari;
tika-abh06t0:8756_0: Puthulaṃ vātha dīghaṃ vā, maṇḍalaṃ vātha vitthataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:8762_0: Nimitte ṭhapayaṃ cittaṃ, tato pāpeti appanaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:8792_0: Thūle te eva saṅkhāre, sametuṃ paribhāvayaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:8845_0: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghaṃ puthunanamahitaṃ suddhasīlaṃ sudānaṃ,
tika-abh06t0:8855_0: Appamaññā tu bhāvento, vineyya paṭighaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:8980_0: Sabbe sattā ca pāṇā ca, bhūtā jīvā ca puggalā;
tika-abh06t0:8987_0: Modantu suhitā sabbe, mā kiñci pāpamāgamā.
tika-abh06t0:9001_0: Mettāya mitte majjhatte, verike ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:9002_0: Karonto sīmasambhedaṃ, attani ca samaṃ phare.
tika-abh06t0:9014_0: Bahukesu ca sattesu, sabbesu ca pavattati.
tika-abh06t0:9036_0: Te tattha kaṭukaṃ ghoramanubhontā sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:9051_0: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvāna vā puna;
tika-abh06t0:9098_0: Iti disvāna sutvā vā, sambhāvetvā punappunaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:9133_0: Kassa vā ruciyā honti, sukhitā vātha dukkhitā.
tika-abh06t0:9136_0: Na sakkā parivattetuṃ, aññena puna kenaci.
tika-abh06t0:9147_0: Ahaṃ ko nāma ke cete, kimaṭṭhānabudhantaro;
tika-abh06t0:9150_0: Sukhitā hontu vā mā vā, dukkhā muccantu vā na vā;
tika-abh06t0:9151_0: Samiddhā vā daliddā vā, kā mamettha vicāraṇā.
tika-abh06t0:9154_0: Palibodho papañco vā, byāpādo vā na me tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9197_0: Mātāva dahare putte, gilāne yobbane ṭhite;
tika-abh06t0:9204_0: Sukhaṃ supati suttopi, pāpaṃ kiñci na passati.
tika-abh06t0:9212_0: Phullaṃva kamalaṃ kāle, candaṃva vimalaṃ jano;
tika-abh06t0:9230_0: Avañjhā tassa pabbajjā, yassa hetāsu gāravo;
tika-abh06t0:9246_0: Appamaññā tato tāsu, na pamajjeyya paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t0:9320_0: Saṅkhepena ca vitthārā, sambhārā ca salakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t0:9321_0: Ajjhattañca bahiddhā ca, catudhā vibhaje kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9359_0: Āyu usmā ca viññāṇaṃ, yadā kāyaṃ jahantimaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:9388_0: Nibbindanto tato rūpe, tadākāre ca gocare;
tika-abh06t0:9394_0: Na taṃ manasi karoti, nāvajjati na pekkhati;
tika-abh06t0:9425_0: Eko bahi anissāya, taṃ taṃ nissāya cāparo.
tika-abh06t0:9431_0: Aṅgabhedaṃ panetāsaṃ, na kathenti tathāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:9466_0: Tathā mānusakaṃ rūpaṃ, thūlaṃ sukhuma santikaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9468_0: Dūre pakāsaṃ channañca, yena passanti yogino;
tika-abh06t0:9486_0: Punadeva ca vuṭṭhāya, parikammaṃ yathā pure;
tika-abh06t0:9532_0: Tividhā ca samāpatti, nirodhā ca tathāparā;
tika-abh06t0:9572_0: Tattha tattha vibhūtattā, ṭhānato bheditā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9617_0: Aniccā ca pabhaṅgū ca, palujjanti cavanti ca.
tika-abh06t0:9619_0: Addhuvā ca asārā ca, vibhavā ca vināsino;
tika-abh06t0:9628_0: Jāyanti parihānāya, na tu jāyanti vuddhiyā;
tika-abh06t0:9632_0: Hutvā antaradhāyanti, na tu katthaci sañcitā.
tika-abh06t0:9635_0: Nirodhadhammā jāyanti, jātā byanti bhavanti te.
tika-abh06t0:9637_0: Yathā nadī pabbateyyā, yathā dīpasikhā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:9640_0: Jātā jātā nirujjhanti, aññe aññe tu jāyare;
tika-abh06t0:9647_0: Rogā gaṇḍā ca sallā ca, aghato ca upaddavā.
tika-abh06t0:9659_0: Jegucchā paṭikūlā ca, bībhacchā ca virūpino;
tika-abh06t0:9663_0: Kapaṇā duggatā dīnā, vipannā ca vighātino.
