tika-abh06t0:9671_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t0:9710_0: Na kiñcettha apekkhitvā, samaggā honti paccayā;
tika-abh06t0:9711_0: Na janetuṃ na sakkonti, samaggā ca kudācanaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9714_0: Rakkhitā vā vidhātā vā, natthi assāmikā tathā.
tika-abh06t0:9719_0: Rittā tucchā ca suññā ca, vivittā sāravajjitā;
tika-abh06t0:9722_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t0:9723_0: Vivasā parivattanti, vaso tesaṃ na katthaci.
tika-abh06t0:9725_0: Na tesu kassacisseraṃ, na tesañcatthi katthaci;
tika-abh06t0:9755_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t0:9756_0: Taṃ taṃ bhāvamatikkamma, pavattanti khaṇe khaṇe.
tika-abh06t0:9767_0: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, vatthuto yanti saṅgahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:9779_0: Niccā dhuvā ce saṅkhārā, kasmā pekkhanti paccaye;
tika-abh06t0:9780_0: Ahutvā yadi nissāya, jātā kā tattha niccatā;
tika-abh06t0:9810_0: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, hitvāna paṇidhiṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t0:9816_0: Nimitte ca pavatte ca, upaṭṭhāti anattato.
tika-abh06t0:9839_0: Tathā hi paccayārabbha, saṅkhārā nissayanti ce;
tika-abh06t0:9848_0: Aniccā puna saṅkhārā, dukkhāti ca vavatthitā;
tika-abh06t0:9881_0: Iccāniccānimittā ca, nirodhā ca khayā vayā;
tika-abh06t0:9944_0: Bhaṅge ñāṇaṃ bhaye ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇamādīnavepi ca.
tika-abh06t0:9984_0: Niccā ce na nirujjheyyuṃ, na bādheyyuṃ sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t0:9985_0: Vase vatteyyumattā ce, tadabhāvā na tādisā.
tika-abh06t0:9993_0: Kālena sammase rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ kālena sammase;
tika-abh06t0:10000_0: Sūpaṭṭhanti ca saṅkhārā, vodāyati ca bhāvanā.
tika-abh06t0:10061_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t0:10077_0: Maggo visuddhiyā nāma, visuddhā ca vipassanā.
tika-abh06t0:10101_0: Udayamhā vimuccitvā, bhaṅge ṭhāti yathā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:10118_0: Ātape viya ussāvo, parissāve jalaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t0:10127_0: Jāyantāpi ca jiyyantā, miyyantā ca nirantaraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10190_0: Leṇaṃ tāṇaṃ patiṭṭhā vā, saraṇaṃ vā na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:10234_0: Mīnāva kumīne baddhā, pañjare viya pakkhino;
tika-abh06t0:10237_0: Paṅke sanno mahānāgo, cando rāhumukhaṃ gato;
tika-abh06t0:10258_0: Aggiṃ viya ca samphuṭṭha-masuciṃ gahitaṃ viya;
tika-abh06t0:10277_0: Gandhaṃ viya ca pisento, pisitaṃyeva sādhukaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:10288_0: Aniccā vata saṅkhārā, niccāti gahitā pure;
tika-abh06t0:10291_0: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhatā puna sabbathā;
tika-abh06t0:10297_0: Ahaṃ mamanti vohāro, paro vātha parassa vā;
tika-abh06t0:10298_0: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, vatthuto natthi katthaci.
tika-abh06t0:10300_0: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t0:10301_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t0:10303_0: Tattha kappenti attānaṃ, bālā dummedhino janā;
tika-abh06t0:10304_0: Ajjhattaṃ vā bahiddhā vā, passato natthi kiñcanaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:10306_0: Sukhito dukkhito vātha, puggalo nāma katthaci;
tika-abh06t0:10309_0: Jāyamānā ca jiyyantā, miyyamānā ca saṅkhatā;
tika-abh06t0:10310_0: Attāva dukkhitā hete, na tu dukkhāya kassaci.
tika-abh06t0:10312_0: Dukkhameva hi sambhoti, dukkhaṃ tiṭṭhati veti ca;
tika-abh06t0:10313_0: Nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṃ dukkhā nirujjhati.
tika-abh06t0:10318_0: Aniccā hontu saṅkhārā, dukkhitā vā mamettha kiṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10321_0: Iti disvā yathābhūtaṃ, yāva bhaṅgā tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10336_0: Na pasārīyatī cittaṃ, na tu sajjati bajjhati;
tika-abh06t0:10345_0: Añjasaṃ maggamuḷhova, dīpaṃ viya ca aṇṇave.
tika-abh06t0:10354_0: Pakkhīva nipphalaṃ rukkhaṃ, hitvā vuṭṭhāti saṅkhatā.
tika-abh06t0:10384_0: Vuṭṭhānaṃ ubhato tasmā, khandhato ca kilesato.
tika-abh06t0:10386_0: Dve tathā tīṇi vā honti, phalāni ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10390_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t0:10393_0: Tato paraṃ pariggayha, nāmarūpaṃ yathā pure.
tika-abh06t0:10415_0: Pariññā ca pahānañca, sacchikiriyā ca bhāvanā;
tika-abh06t0:10418_0: Taṃ sabbaṃ maggakālamhi, karissati tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10425_0: Paraṃ klesā na jāyanti, daḍḍhabījaṅkuraṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t0:10428_0: Maggova maggaṃ bhāveti, jāyamānotha vā puna.
tika-abh06t0:10442_0: Maggo eva hi niyyāti, sesā tassopakārakā;
tika-abh06t0:10448_0: Katvānābhinivesaṃ tu, yattha tattha yathā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:10451_0: Yato kutoci vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi hoti aniccato;
tika-abh06t0:10458_0: Saṅkhāre dukkhato disvā, vuṭṭhahanto sa puggalo.
tika-abh06t0:10472_0: Arūpato ca maggena, āneñjena ca rūpato;
tika-abh06t0:10481_0: Tasmā saddhā ca paññā ca, vatthunicchayalakkhaṇā;
tika-abh06t0:10504_0: Sakiṃdeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā puna puggalo;
tika-abh06t0:10510_0: Anāgāmī ca tatiyo, catuttho arahāti ca;
tika-abh06t0:10511_0: Itthaṃ phalaṭṭhā cattāro, maggaṭṭhā ca tatopare.
tika-abh06t0:10514_0: Cattāro ca yugā honti, aṭṭha cāriyapuggalā.
tika-abh06t0:10526_0: Paṭibhāne ca bhāsanti, ñāṇaṃ bhedagataṃ budhā.
tika-abh06t0:10535_0: Yo vohāro sabhāvena, sā niruttīti sammatā.
tika-abh06t0:10599_0: Visuṃ visuṃ vibhattāti, vibhāgettha tidhā matā.
tika-abh06t0:10650_0: Tesaṃ dāni pavakkhāmi, vibhāgaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10740_0: Dutiyaṃ takkato hīnaṃ, tatiyaṃ tu vicārato;
tika-abh06t0:10758_0: Cattāri pañcakāneva, maggesu ca phalesu ca;
tika-abh06t0:10774_0: Kāmesu catupaññāsa, rūpesu dasa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t0:10787_0: Pāpaṃ natthi kriyāpāpā, na vijjanti anuttare.
tika-abh06t0:10793_0: Chattiṃsa tesaṃ pākāni, kriyā vīsa na cobhayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:10808_0: Bhavaṅgaṃ cuti sandhīti, cittaṃ cuddasadhā ṭhitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:10810_0: Āvajjanādayo dve dve, yugā satta yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10825_0: Aṭṭhasaṭṭhi tathā dve ca, navaṭṭha dve yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:10850_0: Āruppe pana sabbampi, rūpāyattaṃ na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:10852_0: Asaññīnaṃ tu sabbāni, cittāneva na labbhare;
tika-abh06t0:10864_0: Datvā tihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ pana;
tika-abh06t0:10868_0: Datvā dvihetukaṃ sandhiṃ, kāme sugatiyaṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t0:10920_0: Majjhe bhavaṅgaṃ chinditvā, vīthi nāma pavattati.
tika-abh06t0:10944_0: Na sambhoti tadālambaṃ, sopi moghoti vuccati.
tika-abh06t0:10977_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t0:10985_0: Pañca vāre cha vā satta, parittajavanaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t0:10991_0: Sakiṃ dve vā nirodhassa, samāpattikkhaṇe pana;
tika-abh06t0:11014_0: Sattāpi vīthicittāni, kāme rūpe cha sambhavā;
tika-abh06t0:11072_0: Phalamhā cuddasevāhu, maggamhā tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11079_0: Tettiṃsa pana nissāya, hadayaṃ mānasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11088_0: Nissāya hadayaṃ honti, arūpe nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t0:11103_0: Chasu dvāresu jāyanti, dasa muttā ca vīthiyā.
tika-abh06t0:11111_0: Chattiṃsa tayekatiṃsa, dasa ceva naveti ca;
tika-abh06t0:11159_0: Cha sabbatthāpi hontīti, sattadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:11167_0: Ajjhattā ca bahiddhā ca, pañcadvāresu gocarā;
tika-abh06t0:11183_0: Ante cuti bhave majjhe, bhavaṅgampi pavattatīti.
tika-abh06t0:11190_0: Cittānaṃ pana sabbesaṃ, kamato saṅgahaṃ kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11198_0: Chaḷete devalokā ca, mānavāti ca sattadhā;
tika-abh06t0:11210_0: Vehapphalā asaññī ca, suddhāvāsā ca pañcadhā;
tika-abh06t0:11213_0: Avihā ca atappā ca, sudassā ca sudassino;
tika-abh06t0:11234_0: Tatiyamhi catutthaṃ tu, catutthamhi ca pañcamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11235_0: Āruppā ca kameneva, āruppe honti sandhiyo.
tika-abh06t0:11244_0: Bhāvetvā tividhā honti, tīsu bhūmīsu yogino.
tika-abh06t0:11274_0: Na ciraṭṭhāyino tattha, lokiyāpi ca yogino.
tika-abh06t0:11277_0: Pabbajjāyañca bhumme ca, brahmattepi ca tiṭṭhare.
tika-abh06t0:11312_0: Kappeko dve ca cattāro, aṭṭha kappā ca soḷasa.
tika-abh06t0:11317_0: Kappasahassaṃ dve cattāri, aṭṭha soḷasa cakkamā;
tika-abh06t0:11338_0: Vinipātāsure ceva, mānave ca tayopi ca.
tika-abh06t0:11347_0: Ñatvā viññū vibhāveyya, tattha cittāni sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t0:11387_0: Catudhā tividhā ceva, ekadhāti ca bhedato.
tika-abh06t0:11396_0: Cattārekādasa dve dve, satta tevīsa cuddasa.
tika-abh06t0:11416_0: Ekūnasattati rūpe, suddhe paññāsa pañca ca;
tika-abh06t0:11441_0: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ sako maggo, natthaññaṃ kiñci sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:11455_0: Sattavīsa ca tevīsa, tevīsa ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11459_0: Ariyā ceva aṭṭhāti, dvādasannaṃ vasā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11464_0: Chabbīsa cuddasevātha, terasa dve ca mānasā;
tika-abh06t0:11465_0: Dasa sattādhikā ceva, puna sattādhikā dasāti.
tika-abh06t0:11486_0: Tasmā tesaṃ na vattanti, tāni cittāni sabbathā;
tika-abh06t0:11487_0: Maggaṭṭhānaṃ tu maggova, nāññaṃ sambhoti kiñcipi.
tika-abh06t0:11496_0: Natthi sahetukā pākā, duggatattā hi sandhiyā.
tika-abh06t0:11505_0: Sattapāpapahīnā ca, tasmā natthettha tāni ca.
tika-abh06t0:11528_0: Ñeyyā cetasi sambhūtā, dhammā cetasikā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11530_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11533_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti ca vīriyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11534_0: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, cha pakiṇṇakanāmakā.
tika-abh06t0:11540_0: Alobho ca adoso ca, paññā majjhattatāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:11546_0: Kammaññatā ca pāguñña-tā ca ujukatāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:11566_0: Cittena saddhi aṭṭhannaṃ, vippayogo na katthaci.
tika-abh06t0:11604_0: Lobho ca lobhamūlesu, diṭṭhiyuttesu diṭṭhi ca;
tika-abh06t0:11607_0: Dosamūlesu doso ca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11613_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, saha vātha visuṃ na vā;
tika-abh06t0:11620_0: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t0:11638_0: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11650_0: Vitakkaṃ dutiye hitvā, vicārañca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11651_0: Pītiṃ hitvā catutthe ca, pañcamepi ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:11659_0: Viratī appamaññā ca, gahetvā pana sabbaso;
tika-abh06t0:11660_0: Ekamekaṃ gahetvā ca, paccakkhāya ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:11662_0: Kāmesu sattadhā puññe, catudhā ca kriye tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11669_0: Ñatvā yojeyya medhāvī, sāvajjesu ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11671_0: Satta sādhāraṇā ceva, cha dhammā ca pakiṇṇakā;
tika-abh06t0:11680_0: Paṭighe ca vinā pītiṃ, asaṅkhāre tatheva te;
tika-abh06t0:11686_0: Chandaṃ pītiñca uddhacce, hitvā pañcadaseva te;
tika-abh06t0:11687_0: Hitvā vimokkhaṃ kaṅkhañca, gahetvā kaṅkhite tathā.
tika-abh06t0:11692_0: Hitvā chāniyate dhamme, gahetvā ca yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11701_0: Voṭṭhabbe ca vinā pītiṃ, vīriyaṃ sukhatīraṇe;
tika-abh06t0:11710_0: Iti cetasike dhamme, cittesu gaṇite puna;
tika-abh06t0:11711_0: Cittena saha saṅgayha, gaṇeyyāpi ca paṇḍito.
tika-abh06t0:11713_0: Aṭṭhatiṃsāti ye vuttā, cittena saha te puna;
tika-abh06t0:11716_0: Bāvīsevaṃ dasa dve ca, pañca ceti yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11719_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti paññā tathā pana;
tika-abh06t0:11729_0: Na calanti dasa aññe, cuddasā cha ca sambhavāti.
tika-abh06t0:11741_0: Ekadhā chabbidhā ceva, catudhā sattadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:11745_0: Sattasataṃ dasa dve ca, sabbe honti samissitā.
tika-abh06t0:11772_0: Tisataṃ navuti dve ca, bhinnā honti pakiṇṇakā.
tika-abh06t0:11793_0: Catudhā diṭṭhimāno ca, catudhā diṭṭhiyo visuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:11820_0: Kusalañca kriyā ceti, bheditaṃ duvidhampi ca.
tika-abh06t0:11822_0: Taṃ dvayampi sammissetvā, pañcābhiññā ca lokiyā;
tika-abh06t0:11842_0: Yuganandhā ca samathā, tathā yevāpanāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:11844_0: Phasso ca vedanā saññā, cetanā cittameva ca;
tika-abh06t0:11847_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, pīti cekaggatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11850_0: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t0:11851_0: Paññā catubbidhā vuttā, mano pañcāpi vedanā.
tika-abh06t0:11868_0: Tattha jīvitarūpañca, aṭṭhettha na tu gayhare;
tika-abh06t0:11872_0: Sammāsati samādhi ca, micchādiṭṭhi ca dhammato.
tika-abh06t0:11875_0: Sammāmicchāti saṅkappo, vāyāmo ca samādhi ca.
tika-abh06t0:11903_0: Chando ca adhimokkho ca, tatramajjhattatā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11906_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:11910_0: Tato ca sesā sabbepi, niyatāti pakittitā.
tika-abh06t0:11912_0: Keci rāsiṃ na bhajanti, keci cāniyatā yato;
tika-abh06t0:11931_0: Vedanā tīsu vīriyaṃ, sati ca caturāsikā;
tika-abh06t0:11932_0: Samādhi chasu paññā ca, sattaṭṭhānesu dīpitā.
tika-abh06t0:11945_0: Saññā ca cetanā ceva, bhinnā chadhā ca sattadhā.
tika-abh06t0:11954_0: Indriyāni ca bāvīsa, dhammato pana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t0:11956_0: Nava maggaṅgadhammā ca, bhinnā dvādasadhāpi te;
tika-abh06t0:11959_0: Dasa kammapathā dhammā, chaḷeva pana desitā;
tika-abh06t0:11962_0: Paññā dasavidhā tattha, vedanā navadhā ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:11963_0: Samādhi sattadhā hoti, vīriyaṃ pana pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t0:11965_0: Sati bhinnā catudhāva, vitakko tividho mato;
tika-abh06t0:11968_0: Sesā dvattiṃsa sabbepi, dhammā ekekadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t0:11971_0: Phasso ca cetanā saññā, vicāro pīti jīvitaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11977_0: Cittaṃ manindriyaṃ cittaṃ, saddhā saddhindriyaṃ balaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:11978_0: Balesu lokiyā vuttā, lokiye ca dukadvaye.
tika-abh06t0:11992_0: Catudhā sati tattheva, vīriyampi ca pañcadhā.
tika-abh06t0:11994_0: Samādhi sattadhā vutto, jhānaṅgesu ca tattha ca;
tika-abh06t0:12001_0: Tepaññāseva dhammā ca, aṭṭhārasa ca rāsayo.
tika-abh06t0:12041_0: Dhammā pana samatiṃsa, tattha honti sarūpato.
tika-abh06t0:12046_0: Tattha dvādasa dhammā ca, desitā savibhattikā;
tika-abh06t0:12050_0: Sattavīsa ca satteko, dvekeko ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12055_0: Tattha cāniyate sabbe, gahetvā ca pahāya ca;
tika-abh06t0:12071_0: Appamaññā ca hitvātha, mahāpāke ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t0:12074_0: Pañcame appamaññāya, hitvā rūpe ca yojaye.
tika-abh06t0:12116_0: Yojanānayabhedo ca, tasmā tattha na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:12118_0: Māno ca thinamiddhañca, issā macchariyaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:12128_0: Dve dvāvīsaṃ tayo ceva, nava cātha yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12160_0: Vitakko ca vicāro ca, adhikā jhānarāsiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12165_0: Adhikā hasite honti, pīti ca vīriyādayo;
tika-abh06t0:12187_0: Aṭṭhārasa ca satteko, eko cekova pāpake.
tika-abh06t0:12189_0: Dve yevāpanakā honti, rāsayo ca catubbidhā;
tika-abh06t0:12223_0: Magge ca tulyapākattā, phale ca niyatā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12226_0: Lokiye labbhamānāpi, visuṃ ceva siyuṃ na vā.
tika-abh06t0:12228_0: Pāpā labbhanti pāpesu, satta chakkekakā kamā;
tika-abh06t0:12250_0: Tettiṃsa ceva dvattiṃsa, ekatiṃsa ca tiṃsa ca;
tika-abh06t0:12256_0: Itthaṃ cuddasadhā bhinnā, koṭṭhāsā tu sarūpato;
tika-abh06t0:12257_0: Vibhattā tehi yuttā ca, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12268_0: Nava dve dve tatheko ca, yevāpanakasaṅgahā.
tika-abh06t0:12271_0: Dve dve dve tīṇi cekaṃ dve, aṭṭha dasa yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12277_0: Catudhā dvīsu catūsu, catūsu dvīsu caṭṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:12283_0: Tehi yuttā panaṭṭhātha, vīsa dve dve tikekakā.
tika-abh06t0:12298_0: Navadhā anavajjesu, tehi yuttā ca mānasā.
tika-abh06t0:12301_0: Tevīsa kamato satta, dve ca pañcadasāpare.
tika-abh06t0:12303_0: Dve ca dve tikadve dvekā, sāvajjesu ca soḷasa;
tika-abh06t0:12322_0: Tattha sukhā ca dukkhā ca, adukkhamasukhāti ca;
tika-abh06t0:12329_0: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti na.
tika-abh06t0:12331_0: Aññattha pana sabbattha, sukhā dukkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t0:12332_0: Somanassaṃ domanassaṃ, iti nāmaṃ labhanti ca.
tika-abh06t0:12346_0: Sukhayuttā tu tesaṭṭhi, dukkhayuttā tayo tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12368_0: Dasa pañcādhikā honti, bhūmibhedā tato tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12372_0: Voṭṭhabbane ca hasite, hetu nāma na vijjati.
tika-abh06t0:12437_0: Avitakke pakatiyā, tasmā jhānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-abh06t0:12447_0: Tehi yuttā ca viññeyyā, cittuppādā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12459_0: Itthaṃ jhānānaṃ bhedena, pañcadhā mānasā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:12474_0: Ekañca soḷasa ceti, chabbidhā tattha saṅgaho.
tika-abh06t0:12479_0: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ, tathā kāme tihetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12482_0: Sesaṃ mahaggataṃ jhānaṃ, sampayuttā ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-abh06t0:12503_0: Itthaṃ pañca cha satta cha-koṭṭhāsā kamato ṭhitā;
tika-abh06t0:12511_0: Khandhādayo ca koṭṭhāsā, uddiṭṭhā hi yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:12538_0: Khandhā ṭhapetvā nibbānaṃ, natthi paṇṇatti tīsupi.
tika-abh06t0:12540_0: Āhārādi ca koṭṭhāsā, pubbe vuttanayāva te;
tika-abh06t0:12544_0: Ye sāvajjāva tesampi, saṅgaho dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t0:12547_0: Cattāro āsavā vuttā, tayo dhammā sarūpato.
tika-abh06t0:12554_0: Kāmabbhavo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t0:12564_0: Dasa saṃyojanā vuttā, sutte satta sarūpato.
tika-abh06t0:12566_0: Ganthā dhammā ca cattāro, tayo dhammā sarūpato;
tika-abh06t0:12575_0: Dhammā nivaraṇā nāma, chadhā ca pana desitā;
tika-abh06t0:12590_0: Dasete tu samānāva, parato ca sarūpato.
tika-abh06t0:12592_0: Kāmarāgo ca paṭigho, māno diṭṭhi ca saṃsayo;
tika-abh06t0:12594_0: 620. Gāhā ca palibodhā ca, papañcā ceva maññanā.
tika-abh06t0:12595_0: Taṇhā māno ca diṭṭhi ca, diṭṭhi taṇhā ca nissayā.
tika-abh06t0:12601_0: Saṃyojanā kilesā ca, daseva parato ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:12616_0: Avijjā sattasu vuttā, paṭigho pana pañcasu.
tika-abh06t0:12618_0: Māno ca vicikicchā ca, catuṭṭhānesu uddhaṭo;
tika-abh06t0:12619_0: Tīsu dvīsu ca thīnanti, aṭṭhete savibhattikā.
tika-abh06t0:12631_0: Subhaṃ sukhaṃ niccamattā, iti dvādasadhā ṭhitā.
tika-abh06t0:12633_0: Tattha kāye vedanāsu, citte dhammesu cakkamā;
tika-abh06t0:12648_0: Chando ca vīriyaṃ cittaṃ, vīmaṃsāti ca tādinā;
tika-abh06t0:12651_0: Saddhindriyañca vīriyaṃ, sati ceva samādhi ca;
tika-abh06t0:12655_0: Iti bhinnā vibhattā ca, duvidhāpi mahesinā.
tika-abh06t0:12658_0: Passaddhi ca samādhi ca, upekkhāti ca tādinā.
tika-abh06t0:12664_0: Sammāsati samādhī ca, maggo aṭṭhaṅgiko mato.
tika-abh06t0:12669_0: Navadhā vīriyaṃ vuttaṃ, chasu rāsīsu pañcasu;
tika-abh06t0:12672_0: Pañcasveva tu paññā ca, samādhi caturāsiko;
tika-abh06t0:12688_0: Apathā ca sucaritā, tathā duccaritāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:12702_0: Pathavāpo ca tejo ca, vāyo ceti catubbidho;
tika-abh06t0:12755_0: Rūpaṃ nibhāso bhūtānaṃ, saddo nigghosanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:12756_0: Gandho ca gandhanaṃ tattha, raso ca rasanīyatā.
tika-abh06t0:12767_0: Taṃ dvayaṃ panupādinne, kāye sabbattha labbhati;
tika-abh06t0:12807_0: Lahū mudu ca kammaññaṃ, yadā rūpaṃ pavattati.
tika-abh06t0:12822_0: Tadāyaṃ santatākārā, jāti gayhati tassa tu.
tika-abh06t0:12839_0: Yena lakkhīyati rūpaṃ, bhinnākāraṃ khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t0:12856_0: Bhūtattayaṃ tu phoṭṭhabbaṃ, katvā chabbīsadhāpi ca;
tika-abh06t0:12881_0: Pasādā visayā ceva, pañcakā dvepi sambhavā;
tika-abh06t0:12884_0: Yadedaṃ pana sabbampi, rūpaṃ sappaṭighaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12893_0: Pasādā ceva viññatti, dvārarūpaṃ tu sattadhā;
tika-abh06t0:12899_0: Vaṇṇo gandho raso ojā, bhūtarūpanti aṭṭhadhā;
tika-abh06t0:12918_0: Na vatthu tassa sesaṃ tu, sattavīsatividhaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:12933_0: Kiñci sārammaṇaṃ nāma, na gayhatīti sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:12935_0: Upādā ajjhattikaṃ rūpaṃ, upādā bāhiraṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:12941_0: Diṭṭhaṃ rūpaṃ sutaṃ saddo, gandhādi tividhaṃ mutaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12945_0: Aṭṭhārasekakaṃ pañca, catukkanti ca taṃ tathā.
tika-abh06t0:12947_0: Dvārañca hoti vatthu ca, na vatthu dvārameva tu;
tika-abh06t0:12948_0: Na dvāraṃ vatthumevātha, nobhayanti ca niddise.
tika-abh06t0:12959_0: Saddo cittotujo tasmā, rūpamekaṃ dvijaṃ mataṃ;
tika-abh06t0:12977_0: Jāti jarā ca maraṇaṃ, na kutocipi jāyati;
tika-abh06t0:12992_0: Kammaṃ janeti rūpāni, attajāni khaṇe khaṇe;
tika-abh06t0:12998_0: Sandhiyampi kammajaṃ tu, pavattepi ca sambhavā;
tika-abh06t0:12999_0: Janeti rūpaṃ sesāni, pavatte, na tu sandhiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13002_0: Janeti rūpaṃ matake, bāhire tu yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13004_0: Iti kammādayo rūpaṃ, janenti ca yathāsakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13005_0: Sesānampi ca rūpānaṃ, paccayā honti sambhavā.
tika-abh06t0:13018_0: Nava cha caturo dve ca, kalāpā ekavīsati.
tika-abh06t0:13041_0: Suddhaṭṭhakaṃ tu paṭhamaṃ, saddena navakaṃ bhave;
tika-abh06t0:13063_0: Jātimekañca katvā vā, vinātha hadayaṃ tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13066_0: Vatthurūpaṃ na niddiṭṭhaṃ, paṭṭhāne desitaṃ tu taṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13077_0: Bhāvaddasakamekaṃ vā, katvā vatthuṃ vinā tathā.
tika-abh06t0:13080_0: Suddhaṭṭhakā ca satteva, kammajā dasakāni ca.
tika-abh06t0:13086_0: Catukkā ca tikadvikā, ekakā ca yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13088_0: Dve satta nava cha tayo, tayopi ca yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13156_0: Vuttā cettāvatā tesaṃ, uppādo dāni niyyate.
tika-abh06t0:13226_0: Dve satta ca nava pañca, tayo ceko yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13243_0: Bhuttāhāro ṭhitippatto, mātarā ca sayampi ca;
tika-abh06t0:13271_0: Kalāpā tattha labbhanti, dve ca rūpāni uddise.
tika-abh06t0:13277_0: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, sabbepi ca pavattiyaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13282_0: Dasakesveva gahitaṃ, visuṃ kāme na labbhati;
tika-abh06t0:13286_0: Ādikāle na labbhanti, pacchā labbhanti kecipi.
tika-abh06t0:13292_0: Asaññibhūmiyaṃ pubbe, vuttāpi ca na labbhare.
tika-abh06t0:13297_0: Tasmā tevīsa rūpāni, kalāpā pana cuddasa;
tika-abh06t0:13320_0: Duvidhā missitā ceti, bhavanti ca catubbidhā.
tika-abh06t0:13340_0: Chakkena saddhiṃ viññeyyā, tasmā tattha cha saṅgahā.
tika-abh06t0:13343_0: Aṭṭhako rāsi tattheko, tasmā santati vuccati.
tika-abh06t0:13361_0: Dandhaṃ hi vattikaṃ rūpaṃ, nāmaṃ tu lahuvattikaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13363_0: Tathā hi rūpe tiṭṭhante, cittuppādā tu soḷasa;
tika-abh06t0:13364_0: Uppajjitvā pavattitvā, bhijjanti ca lahuṃ lahuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13378_0: Paṭisandhikkhaṇe jātaṃ, tasmā rūpaṃ tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13381_0: Tassa ṭhitikkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13384_0: Tassa bhaṅgakkhaṇe jātaṃ, rūpampi ca tato paraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13394_0: Eko jāyati eko ca, bhijjatīti ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:13408_0: Taṃ nayaṃ paṭibāhitvā, cittena saha bhijjati;
tika-abh06t0:13415_0: Rūpaṃ janeti tatthāpi, utu bhaṅgakkhaṇepi ca.
tika-abh06t0:13424_0: Ghaṭikā saha labbhanti, tasmā sattaraseva te.
tika-abh06t0:13430_0: Dhammānaṃ yamake vuttā, iti pāḷi vadanti ca.
tika-abh06t0:13433_0: Iti vatvā pure vuttaṃ, icchantācariyā nayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13436_0: Rūpāni ca kalāpā ca, ekābaddhā yathārahaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13441_0: Āyukkhayā ca maraṇaṃ, tathā kammakkhayā siyā;
tika-abh06t0:13456_0: Utusambhavarūpaṃ tu, avasissati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t0:13492_0: Appamaññā ca saññā ca, vavatthāruppakāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:13503_0: Aṭṭheva pāḷiyaṃ hitvā, ante tu kasiṇadvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13511_0: Buddhe dhamme ca saṅghe ca, sīle cāge ca attanā;
tika-abh06t0:13530_0: Disvā sutvā phusitvā vā, parikammaṃ tu kubbato.
tika-abh06t0:13532_0: Uggaho nāma sambhoti, nimittaṃ tattha yuñjato;
tika-abh06t0:13535_0: Sādhu sattā sukhī hontu, dukkhā muccantu pāṇino;
tika-abh06t0:13536_0: Aho sattā sukhappattā, hontu yadicchakāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:13553_0: Ekā dasekā dasa ca, tayo pañceti sabbathā;
tika-abh06t0:13566_0: Pañcamaṃ vā catutthaṃ vā, javanaṃ hoti appanā.
tika-abh06t0:13587_0: Yathāsakaṃ phalānaṃ tu, maggā honti niyāmatā.
tika-abh06t0:13624_0: Natthettha koci attā vā, satto jīvo ca puggalo.
tika-abh06t0:13626_0: Yathāpi aṅgasambhārā, hoti saddo ratho iti;
tika-abh06t0:13627_0: Evaṃ khandhesu santesu, hoti sattoti sammuti.
tika-abh06t0:13653_0: Cha vatthūni ca nissāya, cha dvārārammaṇāni ca;
tika-abh06t0:13659_0: Avijjāpaccayā honti, saṅkhārā tu tato tathā;
tika-abh06t0:13662_0: Phasso ca vedanā taṇhā, upādānaṃ bhavo tato;
tika-abh06t0:13742_0: Patvā kalāpato tāva, sammaseyya tato paraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13756_0: Aniccā te khayaṭṭhena, khandhā dukkhā bhayaṭṭhato;
tika-abh06t0:13766_0: Samudayā nirodhā ca, pañcannaṃ dassitā tathā.
tika-abh06t0:13787_0: Obhāso pīti passaddhi, adhimokkho ca paggaho;
tika-abh06t0:13788_0: Sukhaṃ ñāṇamupaṭṭhānaṃ, upekkhā ca nikanti ca.
tika-abh06t0:13821_0: Patante ca vayante ca, bhijjanticceva saṅkhate;
tika-abh06t0:13830_0: Niccā ce na nirujjheyya, na bādheyya sukhā yadi;
tika-abh06t0:13831_0: Vase vatteyya attā ce, tadabhāvā na te tathā.
tika-abh06t0:13839_0: Aniccā dukkhānattā ca, saṅkhārāva na cāparo;
tika-abh06t0:13840_0: Attā vā attanīyaṃ vā, nāhaṃ na tu mamāti ca.
tika-abh06t0:13852_0: Tīradassīva sakuṇo, yāva pāraṃ na passati.
tika-abh06t0:13865_0: Vuṭṭhānagāminī nāma, yadā hoti tadā pana.
tika-abh06t0:13868_0: Maggo tato phalaṃ hoti, bhavaṅgā paccavekkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t0:13873_0: Catutthaṃ pañcamaṃ vātha, chaṭṭhaṃ vāpi yathārahaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13876_0: Tato phalāni tīṇi dve, ekaṃ vātha yathākkamaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:13885_0: Hīne kilese sese ca, paccavekkhati vā na vā.
tika-abh06t0:13887_0: Tato ca puna saṅkhāre, vipassanto yathā pure;
tika-abh06t0:13903_0: Sakimeva imaṃ lokaṃ, āgantvā hoti mānusaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:13912_0: Dvidhāpi catudhā yuggā, aṭṭha honti vibhāgato.
tika-abh06t0:13946_0: Maggo ca parijānāti, dukkhaṃ tebhūmakaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:13965_0: Aggamaggo pajahati, klese sese ca sabbathā.
tika-abh06t0:14003_0: Cittaṃ cetasikaṃ rūpaṃ, nibbānampi ca bhājitaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14007_0: Duvidhā hoti paññatti, atthapaññatti tattha ca.
tika-abh06t0:14015_0: Atthā hi paramatthatthā, paññattatthāti ca dvidhā;
tika-abh06t0:14027_0: Yena vuccati taṃ nāmaṃ, paññapetīti vuccati;
tika-abh06t0:14028_0: Paññattīti ca sā nāmapaññattīti tato matā.
tika-abh06t0:14030_0: Saṅkhā samaññā paññatti, vohāroti ca bhājitā;
tika-abh06t0:14052_0: Nayaṃ gahetvā etthāpi, paññatti duvidhā katā.
tika-abh06t0:14084_0: Tasmā saṃsāramāpanno, satto nāma sa puggalo;
tika-abh06t0:14087_0: Svāyaṃ khandhādito satto, aññoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t0:14090_0: Khandhā khandhānamevāyaṃ, sattoti ca na vuccati;
tika-abh06t0:14099_0: Mato jāto ca na sveva, khandhabhedopacārato;
tika-abh06t0:14141_0: Bālo yo so ca me attā,
tika-abh06t0:14158_0: Tadaññe pana bālā ca, titthiyāpi akovidā;
tika-abh06t0:14187_0: Catudhā tividhā vātha, cintanā tattha icchitā.
tika-abh06t0:14226_0: Vibhattā nāmapaññatti, chabbidhā hoti tattha hi.
tika-abh06t0:14235_0: Tevijjo chaḷabhiñño ca, sīlavā paññavāpi ca.
tika-abh06t0:14250_0: Paññatti duvidhā ceti, ñeyyatthā chabbidhā matāti.
tika-abh06t0:14297_0: Cakkhu sotañca ghānañca, jivhā kāyo pabhā ravo;
tika-abh06t0:14298_0: Gandho rasojā itthī ca, pumā vatthu ca jīvitaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14300_0: Khaṃ jāti jaratā bhaṅgo, rūpassa lahutā tathā;
tika-abh06t0:14307_0: Bhāvadvayaṃ tu kāyaṃva, byāpi no sahavuttikaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14313_0: Rūpanibbatti pāko ca, bhedo ceva yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14315_0: Lahutādittayaṃ taṃ hi, rūpānaṃ kamato siyā;
tika-abh06t0:14328_0: Vatthunā vatthu tāneva, dvārā viññattibhī saha.
tika-abh06t0:14334_0: Vināpaṃ ādito yāva, rasā thūlaṃ na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14339_0: Aṭṭhārasādito rūpā, nipphannaṃ tu na cetaraṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14340_0: Phoṭṭhabbamāpavajjaṃ tu, bhūtaṃ kāme na cetaraṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14343_0: Vaṇṇaṃ taditaraṃ thūlaṃ, sukhumañceti taṃ tidhā.
tika-abh06t0:14348_0: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutañcāpi, viññātaṃ vata cetasā;
tika-abh06t0:14349_0: Ekamekañca pañcāpi, vīsati ca kamā siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14352_0: Vatthu dvārañca sesāni, vatthu dvārañca no siyā.
tika-abh06t0:14361_0: Ñeyyā pavatti rūpassa, piṇḍānañca vasā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14363_0: Kammajaṃ sendriyaṃ vatthu, viññatti cittajā ravo;
tika-abh06t0:14366_0: Aṭṭhakaṃ jāti cākāso, catujā jaratā khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14367_0: Kutoci neva jātaṃ tappākabhedaṃ hi taṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14370_0: Lakkhaṇābhāvato tassā, sati tasmiṃ na niṭṭhiti.
tika-abh06t0:14372_0: Kammacittānalannehi, piṇḍā nava ca satta ca;
tika-abh06t0:14373_0: Cattāro dve ca viññeyyā, sajīve dve ajīvake.
tika-abh06t0:14376_0: Cakkhādī pañca dasakā, kalāpā nava kammajā.
tika-abh06t0:14382_0: Cittajā iti viññeyyā, kalāpā satta vā cha vā.
tika-abh06t0:14388_0: Satta cattāri dve ceti, kalāpā vīsatī dvibhi.
tika-abh06t0:14390_0: Tayaṭṭhakā ca cattāro, navakā dasakā nava;
tika-abh06t0:14391_0: Tayo dveko ca ekena, dasa dvīhi ca tīhi ca.
tika-abh06t0:14399_0: Yena santappanaṃ yena, jīraṇaṃ dahanaṃ tathā;
tika-abh06t0:14409_0: Dvijā dvattiṃsa koṭṭhāsā, sesā eva catubbhavā.
tika-abh06t0:14414_0: Dvijesu manatejehi, dve dve honti panaṭṭhakā;
tika-abh06t0:14430_0: Dasakā navakā ceva, aṭṭhakā ca siyuṃ kamā.
tika-abh06t0:14436_0: Ṭhiti na pāṭhe cittassa, na bhaṅge rūpasambhavo.
tika-abh06t0:14439_0: Atthīti ce pabandhena, ṭhiti tattha pavuccati.
tika-abh06t0:14449_0: Tato parañca kammaggicittajā te ca piṇḍikā;
tika-abh06t0:14450_0: Aṭṭhakā ca duve pubbe, vuttavuttakkhaṇe vade.
tika-abh06t0:14458_0: Bhaṅgā sattarasuppāde, jāyate kammajaṃ na taṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14459_0: Taduddhaṃ jāyate tasmā, takkhayā maraṇaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:14471_0: Yuttiyā idha viññeyyā, pañca vā caturopi vā.
tika-abh06t0:14477_0: Pañca cha utucittehi, pañca chāsaññinaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:14489_0: Atha vā tehi viññeyyaṃ, dasakaṃ navakaṭṭhakaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14501_0: Kāyikaṃ mānasaṃ dukkhaṃ, sukhopekkhā ca vedanā;
tika-abh06t0:14504_0: Yathā tathā vā saññāṇaṃ, saññā satinibandhanaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14512_0: Saddhā sati hirottappaṃ, cāgo mettā mati puna;
tika-abh06t0:14518_0: Lobho doso ca moho ca, diṭṭhi uddhaccameva ca;
tika-abh06t0:14521_0: Māno issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccaṃ thinamiddhakaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14524_0: Byāpāro cetanā phasso, phusanaṃ saraṇaṃ tahiṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14528_0: Vīriyaṃ pīnanā pīti, chando tu kattukāmatā.
tika-abh06t0:14535_0: Alaggo ca acaṇḍikkaṃ, cāgo mettā mati pana;
tika-abh06t0:14570_0: Kāme rūpe ca sesā cha-cattālīsa tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t0:14573_0: Dayādī pañca mānādī, cha yevāpana soḷasa.
tika-abh06t0:14582_0: Pīti ekaggatā ceti, satta vittittayena ve.
tika-abh06t0:14618_0: Diṭṭhi dosena te ganthā, ganthato diṭṭhiha dvidhā.
tika-abh06t0:14635_0: Dudhādiṭṭhi tidhā lobhaṃ, bhitvā sutte dasīritā.
tika-abh06t0:14640_0: Diṭṭhi eva parāmāso, ñeyyo evaṃ samāsato;
tika-abh06t0:14651_0: Aṭṭha pañca cattāri ca, cattāri kamato kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14662_0: Etesvekamayaṃ hutvā, vatthuṃ nissāya vā na vā;
tika-abh06t0:14672_0: Pacchā paccati pākānaṃ, pavatte aṭṭhake duve.
tika-abh06t0:14674_0: Tesuyeva nihīnaṃ tu, datvā sandhiṃ duhetukaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14675_0: Deti dvādasa pāke ca, pavatte dhīyutaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t0:14717_0: Pāpaṃ kāmikamevekaṃ, hetuto taṃ dvidhā puna;
tika-abh06t0:14730_0: Nissāya vā na vā honti, vadhādisahitā kathaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14736_0: Paccate gocaraṃ tassa, sakalaṃ amalaṃ vinā.
tika-abh06t0:14742_0: Ahetū pañca ñāṇāni, gahaṇaṃ tīraṇā ubho.
tika-abh06t0:14766_0: Hitvā mokkhamukhaṃ taṃ hi, dvidhā magge tidhā phale.
tika-abh06t0:14777_0: Vuttiyā na phale pupphaṃ, yathā chinnalatā phalaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14780_0: Na phale vattamānampi, moghapupphaṃ phalaṃ yathā.
tika-abh06t0:14795_0: Tadālambaṃ tato tamhā, cuti hoti javehi vā.
tika-abh06t0:14804_0: Tajjaṃ vatthuṃ sahuppannaṃ, nissāya vā na vā tahiṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14806_0: Tajjā sandhi siyā hitvā, antarattaṃ bhavantare;
tika-abh06t0:14807_0: Antarattaṃ vinā dūre, paṭisandhi kathaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:14812_0: Nāsaññā cavamānassa, nimittaṃ na cutī ca yaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14824_0: Pañcadvāre siyā sandhi, vinā kammaṃ dvigocare;
tika-abh06t0:14827_0: Tamevante cuti tasmiṃ, gocare cavanena tu;
tika-abh06t0:14839_0: Santīraṇaṃ tato tamhā, voṭṭhabbañca sakiṃ tato;
tika-abh06t0:14843_0: Javā mahante voṭṭhabbā, paritte nitare manaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14845_0: Voṭṭhabbassa paritte tu, dvattikkhattuṃ javo viya;
tika-abh06t0:14846_0: Vadanti vuttiṃ taṃ pāṭhe, anāsevanato na hi.
tika-abh06t0:14852_0: Javokāme vibhūte tu, kāmavhe visaye tato.
tika-abh06t0:14854_0: Kāmīnaṃ tu tadālambaṃ, bhavaṅgaṃ tu tato siyā;
tika-abh06t0:14855_0: Avibhūte paritte ca, bhavaṅgaṃ javato bhave.
tika-abh06t0:14861_0: Viruddhattā bhavaṅgaṃ na, kiṃ siyā sukhasandhino.
tika-abh06t0:14870_0: Ime sandhi bhavaṅgā ca, cuti cekūnavīsati.
tika-abh06t0:14872_0: Dve dve āvajjanādīni, gahaṇantāni tīṇi tu;
tika-abh06t0:14898_0: Tidhā chanava caṭṭha ca, tinavā ca yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14900_0: Dvipañca cittaṃ viññāṇaṃ, tisso hi manodhātuyo;
tika-abh06t0:14907_0: Sesaṃ chārammaṇaṃ taṃ hi, tecattālīsa saṅkhyato.
tika-abh06t0:14925_0: Sesā cuddasa bhinnāvacuti sandhi na tīṇipi.
tika-abh06t0:14934_0: Tayaṃ mutaṃ manodhātuttayaṃ diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:14936_0: Diṭṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ ñātaṃ, sābhiññaṃ sesakāmikaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:14949_0: Tettiṃsa ca bhavantete, rūpesu pana puññato.
tika-abh06t0:14952_0: Āruppapuññato te ca, sako pāko sayaṃ puna.
tika-abh06t0:14966_0: Sakaṃ sakaṃ paṭicchaṃ tu, viññāṇehi dvipañcahi;
tika-abh06t0:14978_0: Kāme javā bhavaṅgā ca, kāmarūpe sayampi vā;
tika-abh06t0:14984_0: Te ca pākā sayañcante, phalaṃ majjhā mahaggatā;
tika-abh06t0:14985_0: Kriyāti vīsati honti, sesadvīhi dukehi tu.
tika-abh06t0:14990_0: Atha sātakriyā sātaṃ, sesaṃ sesakriyāpi ca;
tika-abh06t0:14999_0: Dvīhi kāmajavā tīhi, rūpārūpā catūhi tu;
tika-abh06t0:15000_0: Maggā chahi phalādi dve, sesā dve pana sattahi.
tika-abh06t0:15015_0: Ñeyyā sesāni cattāri, bhavaṅgena ca labbhare.
tika-abh06t0:15024_0: Hāsāvajje jave rūpe, aṭṭhachakkehi tehi tu.
tika-abh06t0:15048_0: Rūpe javāti bāvīsa, dvijā sesā tidhātujā.
tika-abh06t0:15056_0: Dosahīnajavā so so, pāko rūpe anāriye;
tika-abh06t0:15071_0: Tike ca tatiye ekaṃ, dve honti dutiyattike.
tika-abh06t0:15105_0: Dve balāni ahetvantadvaye tīṇi tu saṃsaye;
tika-abh06t0:15109_0: Abalāni hi sesāni, vīriyantaṃ balaṃ bhave.
tika-abh06t0:15114_0: Tatiye sāmale tīṇi, cattāri dutiye tathā;
tika-abh06t0:15115_0: Kāme nippītike cāpi, pañcaṅgāni hi sesake.
tika-abh06t0:15132_0: Kriyato vā tadālambaṃ, sopekkhāya sukhī na hi;
tika-abh06t0:15146_0: Ete pītādhikā hāse, vāyāmena ca dvādhikā;
tika-abh06t0:15169_0: Matiṃ pītiṃ matippītiṃ, hitvā te kamato siyuṃ.
tika-abh06t0:15172_0: Tatthetā niyatā vittiṃ, vade sabbattha sambhavā.
tika-abh06t0:15188_0: Ye vuttā ettakā ettha, iti cetasikākhilā;
tika-abh06t0:15210_0: Lobho aṭṭhasu cittesu, thinamiddhaṃ tu pañcasu.
tika-abh06t0:15212_0: Māno catūsu diṭṭhi ca, tathā dvīsu manesu hi;
tika-abh06t0:15213_0: Doso issā ca maccheraṃ, kukkuccañca bhavantime.
tika-abh06t0:15222_0: Kadalī māyā viññeyyā, khandhānaṃ tu yathākkamaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:15228_0: Tatthādī dukkhavatthuttā, dukkhā bhārā ca khādakā.
tika-abh06t0:15241_0: Abhāvassa hi kummānaṃ, lomasseva na vācatā.
tika-abh06t0:15243_0: Khayoti vuccate maggo, tappāpattā idaṃ khayaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:15256_0: To rūpaṃ natthi attādivatthūti ca vavatthape.
tika-abh06t0:15262_0: Yanti yuttā yathā evaṃ, nāmarūpavhayā kriyā.
tika-abh06t0:15264_0: Na nāmarūpato añño, attādi iti dassanaṃ;
tika-abh06t0:15270_0: Sadā sabbattha sabbesaṃ, sadisaṃ na yato tato;
tika-abh06t0:15273_0: Evaṃ tīrayate kaṅkhā, yāya paññāya paccaye;
tika-abh06t0:15274_0: Diṭṭhattā suddhi sā kaṅkhātaraṇaṃ iti vuccati.
tika-abh06t0:15312_0: Sati pītādhimokkho ca, nikanti ca dasīritā.
tika-abh06t0:15318_0: Na maggo gāhavatthuttā, tesaṃ iti vipassati.
tika-abh06t0:15330_0: Bbayādī ghaṭamānassa, nava honti panettha hi.
tika-abh06t0:15339_0: Bhaṅgeva tiṭṭhate ñāṇaṃ, tadā bhaṅgamatī siyā.
tika-abh06t0:15341_0: Evaṃ passayato bhaṅgaṃ, tibhavo khāyate yadā;
tika-abh06t0:15342_0: Sīhādiva bhayaṃ hutvā, siyā laddhā bhayikkhaṇā.
tika-abh06t0:15348_0: Mati yadā tadā laddhā, siyā nibbidapassanā.
tika-abh06t0:15351_0: Jālādīhi ca macchādī, tadā laddhā cajjamati.
tika-abh06t0:15360_0: Catudhā chabbidhā cāpi, bahudhā passato bhusaṃ.
tika-abh06t0:15368_0: Na passe yāva sā tīraṃ, sāmuddasakuṇī yathā.
tika-abh06t0:15376_0: Aniccato hi vuṭṭhānaṃ, yadi yassāsi yogino;
tika-abh06t0:15379_0: Dukkhatonattato tañce, siyā honti kamena te;
tika-abh06t0:15397_0: Te sabbe aṭṭhamokkhānaṃ, lābhī ce chasu majjhasu;
tika-abh06t0:15400_0: Anulomāni cattāri, tīṇi dve vā bhavanti hi;
tika-abh06t0:15413_0: Phalāni ekaṃ dve tīṇi, tato vuttamatikkamā.
tika-abh06t0:15431_0: Na labbhālātacakkaṃva, taṃ hi rūpādayo vinā.
tika-abh06t0:15433_0: Tena tena pakārena, rūpādiṃ na vihāya tu;
tika-abh06t0:15436_0: Labbhate parikappena, yato taṃ na musā tato;
tika-abh06t0:15442_0: Pathavādi viyekopi, puggalo na yato tato;
tika-abh06t0:15445_0: Etaṃ visayato katvā, saṅkhādīhi padehi tu;
tika-abh06t0:15449_0: Kāyaṃ paññatti ce suṭṭhu, vadato suṇa saccato.
tika-abh06t0:15463_0: Vibhāgaṃ ñāpanatthaṃ hi, tathuddeso katoti ce;
tika-abh06t0:15476_0: Iti sā nāmapaññatti, dutiyāti ca kittitā.
